blocks.name: df-fun
blocks.content: Define predicate that determines if some class ` A ` is a function. Definition 10.1 of [Quine] p. 65. For example, the expression ` Fun cos ` is true once we define cosine ( ~ df-cos ). This is not the same as defining a specific function's mapping, which is typically done using the format of ~ cmpt with the maps-to notation (see ~ df-mpt and ~ df-mpo ). Contrast this predicate with the predicates to determine if some class is a function with a given domain ( ~ df-fn ), a function with a given domain and codomain ( ~ df-f ), a one-to-one function ( ~ df-f1 ), an onto function ( ~ df-fo ), or a one-to-one onto function ( ~ df-f1o ). For alternate definitions, see ~ dffun2 , ~ dffun3 , ~ dffun4 , ~ dffun5 , ~ dffun6 , ~ dffun7 , ~ dffun8 , and ~ dffun9 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-fn
blocks.content: Define a function with domain. Definition 6.15(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. For alternate definitions, see ~ dffn2 , ~ dffn3 , ~ dffn4 , and ~ dffn5 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-f
blocks.content: Define a function (mapping) with domain and codomain. Definition 6.15(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. ` F : A --> B ` can be read as " ` F ` is a function from ` A ` to ` B ` ". For alternate definitions, see ~ dff2 , ~ dff3 , and ~ dff4 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-f1
blocks.content: Define a one-to-one function. For equivalent definitions see ~ dff12 and ~ dff13 . Compare Definition 6.15(5) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. We use their notation ("1-1" above the arrow). A one-to-one function is also called an "injection" or an "injective function", ` F : A -1-1-> B ` can be read as " ` F ` is an injection from ` A ` into ` B ` ". Injections are precisely the monomorphisms in the category ` SetCat ` of sets and set functions, see ~ setcmon . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-fo
blocks.content: Define an onto function. Definition 6.15(4) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. We use their notation ("onto" under the arrow). For alternate definitions, see ~ dffo2 , ~ dffo3 , ~ dffo4 , and ~ dffo5 . An onto function is also called a "surjection" or a "surjective function", ` F : A -onto-> B ` can be read as " ` F ` is a surjection from ` A ` onto ` B ` ". Surjections are precisely the epimorphisms in the category ` SetCat ` of sets and set functions, see ~ setcepi . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-f1o
blocks.content: Define a one-to-one onto function. For equivalent definitions see ~ dff1o2 , ~ dff1o3 , ~ dff1o4 , and ~ dff1o5 . Compare Definition 6.15(6) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. We use their notation ("1-1" above the arrow and "onto" below the arrow). A one-to-one onto function is also called a "bijection" or a "bijective function", ` F : A -1-1-onto-> B ` can be read as " ` F ` is a bijection between ` A ` and ` B ` ". Bijections are precisely the isomorphisms in the category ` SetCat ` of sets and set functions, see ~ setciso . Therefore, two sets are called "isomorphic" if there is a bijection between them. According to ~ isof1oidb , two sets are isomorphic iff there is an isomorphism ` Isom ` regarding the identity relation. In this case, the two sets are also "equinumerous", see ~ bren . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-fv
blocks.content: Define the value of a function, ` ( F `` A ) ` , also known as function application. For example, ` ( cos `` 0 ) = 1 ` (we prove this in ~ cos0 after we define cosine in ~ df-cos ). Typically, function ` F ` is defined using maps-to notation (see ~ df-mpt and ~ df-mpo ), but this is not required. For example, ` F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } -> ( F `` 3 ) = 9 ` ( ~ ex-fv ). Note that ~ df-ov will define two-argument functions using ordered pairs as ` ( A F B ) = ( F `` <. A , B >. ) ` . This particular definition is quite convenient: it can be applied to any class and evaluates to the empty set when it is not meaningful (as shown by ~ ndmfv and ~ fvprc ). The left apostrophe notation originated with Peano and was adopted in Definition *30.01 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 235, Definition 10.11 of [Quine] p. 68, and Definition 6.11 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 26. It means the same thing as the more familiar ` F ( A ) ` notation for a function's value at ` A ` , i.e., " ` F ` of ` A ` ", but without context-dependent notational ambiguity. Alternate definitions are ~ dffv2 , ~ dffv3 , ~ fv2 , and ~ fv3 (the latter two previously required ` A ` to be a set.) Restricted equivalents that require ` F ` to be a function are shown in ~ funfv and ~ funfv2 . For the familiar definition of function value in terms of ordered pair membership, see ~ funopfvb . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.) Revised to use ` iota ` . Original version is now theorem ~ dffv4 . (Revised by Scott Fenton, 6-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: df-isom
blocks.content: Define the isomorphism predicate. We read this as " ` H ` is an ` R ` , ` S ` isomorphism of ` A ` onto ` B ` ". Normally, ` R ` and ` S ` are ordering relations on ` A ` and ` B ` respectively. Definition 6.28 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 32, whose notation is the same as ours except that ` R ` and ` S ` are subscripts. (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-isom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wiso(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4), wa(wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-isom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚âÖ c1, c2(c3, c4))‚Üî((c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(s0[c1]s1 ‚Üî(c0 ` s0)[c2](c0 ` s1))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
}

  |- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

} = {
  bitri(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), wa(wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid)))
  df-fun(c0)

  3bitri(wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), copab(s1, s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wss(copab(s1, s2, wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), copab(s1, s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))

  df-co(s1, s2, s0, c0, ccnv(c0))
  ssopab2b(s1, s2, wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  albii(s1, wal(s2, wi(wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  bitri(wal(s2, wi(wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))

blocks.pretty:
thm dffun2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (Fun(c0)‚Üî(Rel(c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(Fun(c0), (Rel(c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))), (Rel(c0)‚àß(c0 ‚àò `' c0)‚äÜ =))
  df-fun(c0)
  anbi2i(Rel(c0), (c0 ‚àò `' c0)‚äÜ =, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)))))
  3bitri((c0 ‚àò `' c0)‚äÜ =, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)))), ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,(‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))‚Üí s1 = s2))), ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)))))
  3bitri((c0 ‚àò `' c0)‚äÜ =, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,(‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))‚Üí s1 = s2))), (c0 ‚àò `' c0)‚äÜ { < s1, s2 > | s1 = s2 }, { < s1, s2 > | ‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))} ‚äÜ { < s1, s2 > | s1 = s2 })
  sseq2i((c0 ‚àò `' c0), cid, { < s1, s2 > | s1 = s2 })
  df-id(s1, s2)
  sseq1i((c0 ‚àò `' c0), { < s1, s2 > | s1 = s2 }, { < s1, s2 > | ‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))})
  df-co(s1, s2, s0, c0, `' c0)
  ssopab2b(s1, s2, ‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)), s1 = s2)
  albii(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,(‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))‚Üí s1 = s2)), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))
  bitri(‚àÄ(s2,(‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))‚Üí s1 = s2)), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))), ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s0,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))
  albii(s2, (‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))‚Üí s1 = s2), ‚àÄ(s0,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)))
  bitr4i((‚àÉ(s0,(s1[`' c0]s0 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))‚Üí s1 = s2), ‚àÄ(s0,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)), (‚àÉ(s0,(s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2))‚Üí s1 = s2))

thm funeu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2)), weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2)), weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))), wex(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2)), wex(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sylan(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wrel(c0))
  funrel(c0)
  releldm(c0, c1, c2)
  ibi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wex(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  eldmg(s0, c1, cdm(c0), c0)
  sylib(wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2)), wi(wex(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))), weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  funmo(s0, c0, c1)
  moeu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: dffun7
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a function. One possibility for the definition of a function in [Enderton] p. 42. (Enderton's definition is ambiguous because "there is only one" could mean either "there is at most one" or "there is exactly one." However, ~ dffun8 shows that it doesn't matter which meaning we pick.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffun7(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wral(s0, cdm(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wral(s0, cdm(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  dffun6(s0, s1, c0)
  anbi2i(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, cdm(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  bitr4i(wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, cdm(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  albii(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  bitr4i(wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wi(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  moabs(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  eldm(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  df-ral(s0, cdm(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: funopg

blocks.name: funopab
blocks.content: A class of ordered pairs is a function when there is at most one second member for each pair. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1995.)

  mpbiran(wfun(copab(s0, s1, w0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), copab(s0, s1, w0), cv(s1)))), wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  relopab(s0, s1, w0)

  nfopab2(s1, s0, w0)

}

blocks.name: funco
blocks.content: The composition of two functions is a function. Exercise 29 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-1997.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.)

thm funco(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wfun(ccom(c0, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wfun(ccom(c0, c1)), wfun(copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))))
  sylibr(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wfun(copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))), wal(hs0, wmo(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))))
  alrimiv(hs0, wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wmo(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))))
  syl2anr(wfun(c0), wfun(c1), wmo(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wal(hs1, wmo(hs2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))
  funmo(hs1, c1, cv(hs0))
  alrimiv(hs1, wfun(c0), wmo(hs2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))
  funmo(hs2, c0, cv(hs1))
  moexexv(hs1, hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))
  funopab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))
  funeqi(ccom(c0, c1), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))))
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wfun(c0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

  syl2anr(Fun(c0), Fun(c1), ‚àÉ*(hs2, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ‚àß hs1[c0]hs2))), ‚àÉ*(hs1, hs0[c1]hs1), ‚àÄ(hs1, ‚àÉ*(hs2, hs1[c0]hs2)))
  funmo(hs1, c1, hs0)
  alrimiv(hs1, Fun(c0), ‚àÉ*(hs2, hs1[c0]hs2))
  funmo(hs2, c0, hs1)
  moexexv(hs1, hs2, hs0[c1]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2)
  funopab(hs0, hs2, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ‚àß hs1[c0]hs2)))
  funeqi((c0 ‚àò c1), { < hs0, hs2 > | ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ‚àß hs1[c0]hs2))})
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

thm funssres(class c0, class c1) {

  syl6rbbr(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(c0, cdm(c1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  impbid(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))))
  jcad(wss(c1, c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  a1i(wss(c1, c0), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1))))
  opeldm(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)
  impcomd(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  pm2.43d(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))
  com34(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  imp(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))))
  com23(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))))
  exp43(wfun(c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(c1, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))
  syl2an(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wa(wss(c1, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)), weu(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))))
  funeu2(hs1, c0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  imp(wss(c1, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))))

  adantr(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls), wrel(cun(c0, c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wrel(cun(c0, c1)), wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)))
  anim12i(wfun(c0), wfun(c1), wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  funrel(c0)

blocks.name: fununmo
blocks.content: If the union of classes is a function, there is at most one element in relation to an arbitrary element regarding one of these classes. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fununmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl(wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(s1), cun(c0, c1), cv(s0))))
  funmo(s0, cun(c0, c1), cv(s1))
  moimi(s0, wbr(cv(s1), cun(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  sylibr(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cun(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))
  orc(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))
  brun(cv(s1), c0, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

blocks.name: fununfun
blocks.content: If the union of classes is a function, the classes itselves are functions. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jul-2019.)

  relun(c0, c1)
  jca(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wfun(c1))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))))
  anim12i(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))))
  simpl(wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  alrimiv(hs0, wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  fununmo(hs1, hs0, c0, c1)
  dffun6(hs0, hs1, c0)
  sylibr(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1))), wfun(c1), wa(wrel(c1), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))))
  anim12i(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wrel(c1), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  simpr(wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  alrimiv(hs0, wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  sylbi(wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wfun(cun(c1, c0)))
  funeqi(cun(c0, c1), cun(c1, c0))

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm funcnvsn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), wrel(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1)))))
  relcnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
  ax-gen(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1))))
  ax-mp(wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1))), wmo(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), c0)))
  moeq(hs1, c0)
  moimi(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1)))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wbr(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cv(hs0)))
  brcnv(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cv(hs1))
  df-br(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c1)))
  elsni(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c1))
  opth1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  dffun6(hs0, hs1, ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))))

thm funtp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2)), wfun(ctp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
  -| wcel(c5, universe)
} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2)), wfun(ctp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5))), wfun(cun(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5)))))
  3impb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2), wfun(cun(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5)))))
  syl2an(wne(c0, c1), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2)), wfun(cun(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5)))), wa(wfun(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4))), wfun(csn(cop(c2, c5)))), wceq(cin(cdm(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4))), cdm(csn(cop(c2, c5)))), emptycls))
  jctir(wne(c0, c1), wfun(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4))), wfun(csn(cop(c2, c5))))
  funpr(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  funsn(c2, c5)
  syl5eq(cin(cdm(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4))), cdm(csn(cop(c2, c5)))), emptycls, cin(cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(c2)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2)))
  ineq12i(cdm(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4))), cdm(csn(cop(c2, c5))), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(c2))
  eqtri(cdm(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4))), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), cpr(c0, c1))
  dmprop(c0, c3, c1, c4)
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  dmsnop(c2, c5)
  sylib(wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2)), wceq(cin(cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(c2)), emptycls), wa(wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c2)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c1), csn(c2)), emptycls)))
  anim12i(wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c2)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c1), csn(c2)), emptycls))
  disjsn2(c0, c2)
  disjsn2(c1, c2)
  undisj1(csn(c0), csn(c2), csn(c1))
  funun(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5)))
  funeqi(ctp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5)), cun(cpr(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5))))
  df-tp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5))
}

blocks.name: fntp
blocks.content: A function with a domain of three elements. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fntp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2)), wfn(ctp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5)), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
  -| wcel(c5, universe)
} = {
  sylanblrc(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2)), wfn(ctp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5)), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), wfun(ctp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5))), wceq(cdm(ctp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5))), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))
  funtp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  dmtpop(c0, c3, c1, c4, c2, c5)
  df-fn(ctp(cop(c0, c3), cop(c1, c4), cop(c2, c5)), ctp(c0, c1, c2))
}

thm fntp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚â† c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c2)‚Üí { < c0, c3 >, < c1, c4 >, < c2, c5 > }[Fn]{ c0, c1, c2 })

  ‚ä£ c5 ‚àà ùïå
} = {
  sylanblrc((c0 ‚â† c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c2), { < c0, c3 >, < c1, c4 >, < c2, c5 > }[Fn]{ c0, c1, c2 }, Fun({ < c0, c3 >, < c1, c4 >, < c2, c5 > }), dom({ < c0, c3 >, < c1, c4 >, < c2, c5 > })= { c0, c1, c2 })

  df-fn({ < c0, c3 >, < c1, c4 >, < c2, c5 > }, { c0, c1, c2 })

blocks.name: funcnvpr
blocks.content: The converse pair of ordered pairs is a function if the second members are different. Note that the second members need not be sets. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcnvpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c5)), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c5)))))
} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c5)), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c5)))), wfun(cun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4))), ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5))))))
  sylancr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c5)), wfun(cun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4))), ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5))))), wa(wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5))))), wceq(cin(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5))))), emptycls))
  pm3.2i(wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5)))))
  funcnvsn(c0, c4)
  funcnvsn(c2, c5)
  eqtrd(cin(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5))))), emptycls, cin(csn(c4), csn(c5)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c5)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c5), wceq(cin(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5))))), cin(csn(c4), csn(c5))))
  ineqan12d(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5)))), csn(c4), csn(c5), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl5eqr(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), csn(c4), crn(csn(cop(c0, c4))), wcel(c0, c1))
  df-rn(csn(cop(c0, c4)))
  rnsnopg(c0, c1, c4)
  syl5eqr(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5)))), csn(c5), crn(csn(cop(c2, c5))), wcel(c2, c3))
  df-rn(csn(cop(c2, c5)))
  rnsnopg(c2, c3, c5)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c5), wceq(cin(csn(c4), csn(c5)), emptycls))
  disjsn2(c4, c5)
  funun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4))), ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5))))
  funeqi(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c5))), cun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4))), ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5)))))
  eqtri(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c5))), cun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4))), ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5)))), ccnv(cun(csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5)))))
  cnveqi(cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c5)), cun(csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5))))
  df-pr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c5))
  cnvun(csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5)))
}

blocks.name: fun0
blocks.content: The empty set is a function. Theorem 10.3 of [Quine] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-1998.)

blocks.name: funcnv0
blocks.content: The converse of the empty set is a function. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: funcnvcnv
blocks.content: The double converse of a function is a function. (Contributed by NM, 21-Sep-2004.)

blocks.name: funcnv2
blocks.content: A simpler equivalence for single-rooted (see ~ funcnv ). (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcnv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))))
  mpbiran(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  dffun6(s0, s1, ccnv(c0))
  albii(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  mobii(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

}

blocks.name: funcnv
blocks.content: The converse of a class is a function iff the class is single-rooted, which means that for any ` y ` in the range of ` A ` there is at most one ` x ` such that ` x A y ` . Definition of single-rooted in [Enderton] p. 43. See ~ funcnv2 for a simpler version. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  albii(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  mobii(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  pm4.71ri(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  brelrn(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  moanimv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  funcnv2(s0, s1, c0)
  df-ral(s0, crn(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), crn(c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: fun2cnv
blocks.content: The double converse of a class is a function iff the class is single-valued. Each side is equivalent to Definition 6.4(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23, who use the notation "Un(A)" for single-valued. Note that ` A ` is not necessarily a function. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm fun2cnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)))))
  funcnv2(s0, s1, ccnv(c0))
  albii(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  mobii(s1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (Fun(`' `' c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[c0]s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(Fun(`' `' c0), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[c0]s1)), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s1[`' c0]s0)))
  funcnv2(s0, s1, `' c0)
  albii(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s1[`' c0]s0), ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[c0]s1))
  mobii(s1, s1[`' c0]s0, s0[c0]s1)

  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: svrelfun
blocks.content: A single-valued relation is a function. (See ~ fun2cnv for "single-valued.") Definition 6.4(4) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2006.)

blocks.name: fun11
blocks.content: Two ways of stating that ` A ` is one-to-one (but not necessarily a function). Each side is equivalent to Definition 6.4(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24, who use the notation "Un_2 (A)" for one-to-one (but not necessarily a function). (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2006.)

blocks.name: funin
blocks.content: The intersection with a function is a function. Exercise 14(a) of [Enderton] p. 53. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: funres11
blocks.content: The restriction of a one-to-one function is one-to-one. (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-1998.)

blocks.name: funcnvres
blocks.content: The converse of a restricted function. (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcnvres(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wceq(ccnv(cres(c0, c1)), cres(ccnv(c0), cima(c0, c1))))
} = {
  syl5req(ccnv(cres(c0, c1)), cres(ccnv(c0), cima(c0, c1)), cres(ccnv(c0), cdm(ccnv(cres(c0, c1)))), wfun(ccnv(c0)))
  reseq2i(ccnv(c0), cima(c0, c1), cdm(ccnv(cres(c0, c1))))
  eqtri(cima(c0, c1), cdm(ccnv(cres(c0, c1))), crn(cres(c0, c1)))
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  df-rn(cres(c0, c1))
  mpan2(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wceq(cres(ccnv(c0), cdm(ccnv(cres(c0, c1)))), ccnv(cres(c0, c1))), wss(ccnv(cres(c0, c1)), ccnv(c0)))
  ax-mp(wss(ccnv(cres(c0, c1)), ccnv(c0)), wss(cres(c0, c1), c0))
  resss(c0, c1)
  cnvss(cres(c0, c1), c0)
  funssres(ccnv(c0), ccnv(cres(c0, c1)))
}

blocks.name: cnvresid
blocks.content: Converse of a restricted identity function. (Contributed by FL, 4-Mar-2007.)

blocks.name: funcnvres2
blocks.content: The converse of a restriction of the converse of a function equals the function restricted to the image of its converse. (Contributed by NM, 4-May-2005.)

blocks.name: funimass1

blocks.name: funimaex
blocks.content: The image of a set under any function is also a set. Equivalent of Axiom of Replacement ~ ax-rep . Axiom 39(vi) of [Quine] p. 284. Compare Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2002.)

blocks.name: isarep1
blocks.content: Part of a study of the Axiom of Replacement used by the Isabelle prover. The object PrimReplace is apparently the image of the function encoded by ` ph ( x , y ) ` i.e. the class ` ( { <. x , y >. | ph } " A ) ` . If so, we can prove Isabelle's "Axiom of Replacement" conclusion without using the Axiom of Replacement, for which I (N. Megill) currently have no explanation. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm isarep1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wsb(s0, s2, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wsb(s0, s2, w0))), diffss(s0, s2))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(s0), cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cv(s0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0))))
  elima(hs0, cv(s0), copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  rexbii(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cv(s0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0)))
  3bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cv(s0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), copab(s1, s2, w0)), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0)))
  df-br(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cv(s0))
  opelopabsb(s1, s2, cv(hs0), cv(s0), w0)
  bitr2i(wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0)))
  sbbii(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0), wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0))
  sbsbc(s0, s2, w0)
  sbsbc(hs0, s1, wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0))
  cbvrex(hs0, s1, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wsb(s0, s2, w0))
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, wsb(s0, s2, w0))
  nfv(hs0, wsb(s0, s2, w0))
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s1, s2, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wsb(s0, s2, w0))
}

thm isarep1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (s0 ‚àà({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,[s0 / s2]w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((s0 ‚àà({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,[s0 / s2]w0)), d(s0, s2))
  3bitri(s0 ‚àà({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,[s0 / s2]w0), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0[{ < s1, s2 > | w0 }]s0), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,[hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0))
  elima(hs0, s0, { < s1, s2 > | w0 }, c0)
  vex(s0)
  rexbii(hs0, c0, hs0[{ < s1, s2 > | w0 }]s0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0)
  3bitri(hs0[{ < s1, s2 > | w0 }]s0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0, < hs0, s0 > ‚àà { < s1, s2 > | w0 }, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0)
  df-br(hs0, { < s1, s2 > | w0 }, s0)
  opelopabsb(s1, s2, hs0, s0, w0)
  bitr2i([hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0)
  sbbii(hs0, s1, [s0 / s2]w0, [s0 / s2]w0)
  sbsbc(s0, s2, w0)
  sbsbc(hs0, s1, [s0 / s2]w0)
  cbvrex(hs0, s1, c0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0, [s0 / s2]w0)
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, [s0 / s2]w0)
  nfv(hs0, [s0 / s2]w0)
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, [s0 / s2]w0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ < s1, s2 > | w0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w([s0 / s2]w0)
}

blocks.name: isarep2
blocks.content: Part of a study of the Axiom of Replacement used by the Isabelle prover. In Isabelle, the sethood of PrimReplace is apparently postulated implicitly by its type signature " ` [ ` i, ` [ ` i, i ` ] ` => o ` ] ` => i", which automatically asserts that it is a set without using any axioms. To prove that it is a set in Metamath, we need the hypotheses of Isabelle's "Axiom of Replacement" as well as the Axiom of Replacement in the form ~ funimaex . (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm isarep2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wral(s1, c0, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(w0, wsb(s3, s2, w0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  isseti(s0, cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0))
  eqeltri(cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0), universe, cima(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), c0))
  eqtr3i(cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0), cima(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), c0), cima(cres(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0), c0))
  resima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)
  imaeq1i(cres(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0), c0, copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  resopab(s1, s2, c0, w0)
  ax-mp(wcel(cima(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), c0), universe), wfun(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))))
  mpgbir(s1, wfun(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))), wmo(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  funopab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  mpbir(wmo(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wmo(s2, w0)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wmo(s2, w0), wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(w0, wsb(s3, s2, w0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  rspec(s1, c0, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(w0, wsb(s3, s2, w0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  mo3(s2, s3, w0)
  nfv(s3, w0)
  moanimv(s2, wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)
  funimaex(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), c0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)
  diff.copab.s(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isarep2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚àÉ(s0, s0 =({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0))
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s3,((w0 ‚àß[s3 / s2]w0)‚Üí s2 = s3))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  isseti(s0, ({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0))
  eqeltri(({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0), universe, ({ < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)} " c0))
  eqtr3i(({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0), ({ < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)} " c0), (({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } |` c0)" c0))
  resima({ < s1, s2 > | w0 }, c0)
  imaeq1i(({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } |` c0), c0, { < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)})
  resopab(s1, s2, c0, w0)
  ax-mp(({ < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)} " c0)‚àà ùïå, Fun({ < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}))
  mpgbir(s1, Fun({ < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}), ‚àÉ*(s2,(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))
  funopab(s1, s2, (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))
  mpbir(‚àÉ*(s2,(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ*(s2, w0)))
  sylibr(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ*(s2, w0), ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s3,((w0 ‚àß[s3 / s2]w0)‚Üí s2 = s3))))
  rspec(s1, c0, ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s3,((w0 ‚àß[s3 / s2]w0)‚Üí s2 = s3))))
  mo3(s2, s3, w0)
  nfv(s3, w0)
  moanimv(s2, s1 ‚àà c0, w0)
  funimaex({ < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}, c0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, { < s1, s2 > | w0 }, c0)
  diff.copab.s(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: fneu
blocks.content: There is exactly one value of a function. (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm fneu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), weu(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  funfni(c0, c1, c2, weu(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  mpbid(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), weu(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wmo(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  funmo(s0, c0, c2)
  syl(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), wb(wmo(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))), weu(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wex(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  ibi(wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wex(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  eldmg(s0, c2, cdm(c0), c0)
  exmoeub(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fneu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  funfni(c0, c1, c2, ‚àÉ!(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  mpbid((Fun(c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c0)), ‚àÉ!(s0, c2[c0]s0), ‚àÉ*(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  adantr(Fun(c0), c2 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÉ*(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  funmo(s0, c0, c2)
  syl((Fun(c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c0)), (‚àÉ*(s0, c2[c0]s0)‚Üî ‚àÉ!(s0, c2[c0]s0)), ‚àÉ(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  adantl(Fun(c0), c2 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÉ(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  ibi(c2 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÉ(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  eldmg(s0, c2, dom(c0), c0)
  exmoeub(s0, c2[c0]s0)
}

blocks.name: fnun
blocks.content: The union of two functions with disjoint domains. (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3)))
} = {
  imp(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3)))
  syl2anb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wi(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3))), wa(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1)), wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)))
  df-fn(c0, c1)
  df-fn(c2, c3)
  an4s(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3), wi(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3))))
  impcom(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wi(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3))))
  expd(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3)))
  syl6ibr(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3)), wa(wfun(cun(c0, c2)), wceq(cdm(cun(c0, c2)), cun(c1, c3))))
  jctird(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wfun(cun(c0, c2)), wceq(cdm(cun(c0, c2)), cun(c1, c3)))
  syl6bir(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wfun(cun(c0, c2)), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls)))
  anbi2d(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls))
  eqeq1d(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls, cin(c1, c3), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)))
  ineq12(cdm(c0), c1, cdm(c2), c3)
  funun(c0, c2)
  syl5eq(cdm(cun(c0, c2)), cun(c1, c3), cun(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)))
  dmun(c0, c2)
  uneq12(cdm(c0), c1, cdm(c2), c3)
  df-fn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2[Fn]c3)‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ)‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÉ c3))
} = {
  imp((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2[Fn]c3), (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ, (c0 ‚ãÉ c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÉ c3))
  syl2anb(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3, ((c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÉ c3)), (Fun(c0)‚àß dom(c0)= c1), (Fun(c2)‚àß dom(c2)= c3))
  df-fn(c0, c1)
  df-fn(c2, c3)
  an4s(Fun(c0), dom(c0)= c1, Fun(c2), dom(c2)= c3, ((c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÉ c3)))
  impcom((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c2)), (dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß dom(c2)= c3), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÉ c3)))
  expd((dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß dom(c2)= c3), (Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c2)), (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ, (c0 ‚ãÉ c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÉ c3))
  syl6ibr((dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß dom(c2)= c3), ((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c2))‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ), (c0 ‚ãÉ c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÉ c3), (Fun((c0 ‚ãÉ c2))‚àß dom((c0 ‚ãÉ c2))=(c1 ‚ãÉ c3)))
  jctird((dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß dom(c2)= c3), ((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c2))‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ), Fun((c0 ‚ãÉ c2)), dom((c0 ‚ãÉ c2))=(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))
  syl6bir((dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß dom(c2)= c3), ((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c2))‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ), Fun((c0 ‚ãÉ c2)), ((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c2))‚àß(dom(c0)‚ãÇ dom(c2))= ‚àÖ))
  anbi2d((dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß dom(c2)= c3), (Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c2)), (dom(c0)‚ãÇ dom(c2))= ‚àÖ, (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ)
  eqeq1d((dom(c0)‚ãÇ dom(c2)), emptycls, (c1 ‚ãÇ c3), (dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß dom(c2)= c3))
  ineq12(dom(c0), c1, dom(c2), c3)
  funun(c0, c2)
  syl5eq(dom((c0 ‚ãÉ c2)), (c1 ‚ãÉ c3), (dom(c0)‚ãÉ dom(c2)), (dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß dom(c2)= c3))
  dmun(c0, c2)
  uneq12(dom(c0), c1, dom(c2), c3)
  df-fn((c0 ‚ãÉ c2), (c1 ‚ãÉ c3))
}

blocks.name: fnunsn
blocks.content: Extension of a function with a new ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnunsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfn(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cun(c4, csn(cop(c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c1, cun(c5, csn(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c5)))
} = {

  ancom(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[c0]s1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)))
  anbi12i(Fun((c0 |` c1)), dom((c0 |` c1))= c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[c0]s1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)))

blocks.name: fnimadisj
blocks.content: A class that is disjoint with the domain of a function has an empty image under the function. (Contributed by FL, 24-Jan-2007.)

blocks.name: fnimaeq0
blocks.content: Images under a function never map nonempty sets to empty sets. _EDITORIAL_: usable in ~ fnwe2lem2 . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)

thm fnopabg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, weu(s1, w0)), wfn(c1, c0))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, c0, weu(s1, w0)), wfn(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wa(wmo(s1, w0), wex(s1, w0))), wfn(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), c0))
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, c0, wa(wmo(s1, w0), wex(s1, w0))), wfn(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), c0), wa(wral(s0, c0, wmo(s1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, w0))), wa(wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wceq(cdm(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), c0)))
  anbi12i(wral(s0, c0, wmo(s1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, w0)), wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wceq(cdm(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), c0))
  3bitr4ri(wral(s0, c0, wmo(s1, w0)), wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wmo(s1, w0))))
  albii(s0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wmo(s1, w0)))
  moanimv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  funopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  df-ral(s0, c0, wmo(s1, w0))
  dmopab3(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  r19.26(s0, c0, wmo(s1, w0), wex(s1, w0))
  df-fn(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), c0)
  ralbii(s0, c0, weu(s1, w0), wa(wmo(s1, w0), wex(s1, w0)))
  biancomi(weu(s1, w0), wmo(s1, w0), wex(s1, w0))
  df-eu(s1, w0)
  fneq1i(c1, c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm mptfng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wfn(c2, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wfn(c2, c0), wral(s0, c0, weu(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe), weu(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eueq(hs0, c1)
  fnopabg(s0, hs0, c0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqtri(c2, copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm dmmptd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6reqr(cdm(c0), c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  elexd(c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  rabid2(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm dmmptd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c0)= c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6reqr(dom(c0), c1, { s0 ‚àà c1 | c2 ‚àà ùïå }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, c1 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | c2 ‚àà ùïå }, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elexd(c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  rabid2(s0, c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm mptun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
} = {
  eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, cun(c0, c1), c2)
  eqtr4i(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cun(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  uneq12i(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  eqtr4i(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cun(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), copab(s0, hs0, wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  opabbii(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  elun(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  andir(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  unopab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm mptun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚Ü¶ c2)=((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
} = {

  uneq12i((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c2)})
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2)

  opabbii(s0, hs0, (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚àß hs0 = c2), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚à®(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c2)))
  bitri((s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚àß hs0 = c2), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚à®(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c2)), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 = c2))
  anbi1i(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), hs0 = c2, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® s0 ‚àà c1))
  elun(s0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: sbcfng
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through the function predicate with a domain. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcfng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3)), wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3)), wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3))))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wfn(c2, c3), wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3))))
  df-fn(c2, c3)
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3))), wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wa(wsbc(s0, c0, wfun(c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cdm(c2), c3))), wa(wfun(csb(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cdm(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wfun(c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wfun(csb(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cdm(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  sbcfung(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wceq(cdm(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, cdm(c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  sbceqg(s0, c0, c1, cdm(c2), c3)
  eqeq1i(csb(s0, c0, cdm(c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3), cdm(csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  csbdm(s0, c0, c2)
  sbcan(s0, c0, wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3))
  df-fn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

thm sbcfng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí([c0 / s0]c2[Fn]c3 ‚Üî[c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0]c2[Fn]c3, [c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0](Fun(c2)‚àß dom(c2)= c3))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, c0 ‚àà c1, c2[Fn]c3, (Fun(c2)‚àß dom(c2)= c3))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[Fn]c3 ‚Üî(Fun(c2)‚àß dom(c2)= c3)))
  df-fn(c2, c3)
  3bitr4g(c0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0](Fun(c2)‚àß dom(c2)= c3), [c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3, ([c0 / s0]Fun(c2)‚àß[c0 / s0]dom(c2)= c3), (Fun([c0 / s0]c2)‚àß dom([c0 / s0]c2)=[c0 / s0]c3))
  anbi12d(c0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0]Fun(c2), [c0 / s0]dom(c2)= c3, Fun([c0 / s0]c2), dom([c0 / s0]c2)=[c0 / s0]c3)
  sbcfung(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0]dom(c2)= c3, dom([c0 / s0]c2)=[c0 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0]dom(c2)=[c0 / s0]c3)
  sbceqg(s0, c0, c1, dom(c2), c3)
  eqeq1i([c0 / s0]dom(c2), [c0 / s0]c3, dom([c0 / s0]c2))
  csbdm(s0, c0, c2)
  sbcan(s0, c0, Fun(c2), dom(c2)= c3)
  df-fn([c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

thm sbcfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wf(c2, c3, c4)), wf(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, c0, c4)), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4))))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c3, c4), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wf(c2, c3, c4), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4))))
  df-f(c2, c3, c4)
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4))), wf(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, c0, c4)), wa(wsbc(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3)), wsbc(s0, c0, wss(crn(c2), c4))), wa(wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wss(crn(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3)), wsbc(s0, c0, wss(crn(c2), c4)), wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wss(crn(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4)))
  sbcfng(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wss(crn(c2), c4)), wss(crn(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4)), wss(csb(s0, c0, crn(c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4)))
  sbcssg(s0, c0, c1, crn(c2), c4)
  sseq1i(csb(s0, c0, crn(c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4), crn(csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  csbrn(s0, c0, c2)
  sbcan(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4))
  df-f(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, c0, c4))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí([c0 / s0](c2 : c3 ‚Üí c4)‚Üî([c0 / s0]c2 :[c0 / s0]c3 ‚Üí[c0 / s0]c4)))

  3bitr4g(c0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0](c2[Fn]c3 ‚àß ran(c2)‚äÜ c4), ([c0 / s0]c2 :[c0 / s0]c3 ‚Üí[c0 / s0]c4), ([c0 / s0]c2[Fn]c3 ‚àß[c0 / s0]ran(c2)‚äÜ c4), ([c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3 ‚àß ran([c0 / s0]c2)‚äÜ[c0 / s0]c4))
  anbi12d(c0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0]c2[Fn]c3, [c0 / s0]ran(c2)‚äÜ c4, [c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3, ran([c0 / s0]c2)‚äÜ[c0 / s0]c4)
  sbcfng(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)

  sbcssg(s0, c0, c1, ran(c2), c4)
  sseq1i([c0 / s0]ran(c2), [c0 / s0]c4, ran([c0 / s0]c2))

blocks.origin:
thm fco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wf(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wf(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2), wa(wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2)))
  syl2anb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wa(wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1)))
  df-f(c0, c1, c2)
  df-f(c3, c4, c1)
  imp(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1)), wa(wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2)))

  anbi12ci(wf(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0), universe), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  bitr3i(wf(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0), universe), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wfn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0)))
  dffn2(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0))

thm f1co(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  df-f1(c0, c1, c2)

  fco(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  ancoms(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c3)), wfun(ccnv(ccom(c0, c3))))
  sylibr(wa(wfun(ccnv(c3)), wfun(ccnv(c0))), wfun(ccnv(ccom(c0, c3))), wfun(ccom(ccnv(c3), ccnv(c0))))

  3bitr4ri(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c2)))), w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wceq(crn(c0), c2)), wa(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wceq(crn(c0), c2)), wf(c0, c1, c2)), wa(wa(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c2))), wf(c0, c1, c2)))

  anim1ci(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(ccnv(c0), c2), wfn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c1))
  mpcom(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c1), wrel(c0))
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  sylbi(wrel(c0), wi(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c1)), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0))
  dfrel2(c0)
  biimprd(wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wfn(c0, c1), wfn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c1))
  fneq1(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0, c1)
  dff1o4(c0, c1, c2)
  dff1o4(ccnv(c0), c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: f1ssf1

thm f1ssf1(class c0, class c1) {

  ex(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0), wi(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1))))
  syl(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wi(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1))), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1))
  funssres(c0, c1)
  eqcoms(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1, wi(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1))))
  syl5ibr(wceq(c1, cres(c0, cdm(c1))), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1)), wfun(ccnv(cres(c0, cdm(c1)))))
  funres11(c0, cdm(c1))

  cnveq(c1, cres(c0, cdm(c1)))
}

} = {

blocks.origin:
thm f1osng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1o(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0), csn(c2)))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wf1o(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0), csn(c2)), wf1o(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs1))), wf1o(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wf1o(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs1))), wf1o(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wf1o(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))))
  f1oeq2d(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs1)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wf1o(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wf1o(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1)))), wceq(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1)))))

blocks.name: f1oprg
blocks.content: An unordered pair of ordered pairs with different elements is a one-to-one onto function, analogous to ~ f1oprswap . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Aug-2017.)

thm f1oprg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {

} = {
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wa(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c6)), wf1o(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c6)), cpr(c0, c4), cpr(c2, c6)))

  disjsn2(c0, c4)

  a1i(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wa(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c6))), wceq(cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c4, c6))), cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c6))))

blocks.name: brprcneu
blocks.content: If ` A ` is a proper class and ` F ` is any class, then there is no unique set which is related to ` A ` through the binary relation ` F ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm brprcneu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {

thm fv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

thm dffv3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl6reqr(cfv(c0, c1), cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), cio(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))), wcel(c1, universe))

  elimasng(c1, universe, cv(s0), universe, c0)
  df-br(c1, c0, cv(s0))
  df-fv(s0, c0, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), emptycls, cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  iotabidv(s0, wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))

  mto(weu(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  nex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  noel(cv(s0))

  iotanul(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(c1, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dffv4
blocks.content: The previous definition of function value, from before the ` iota ` operator was introduced. Although based on the idea embodied by Definition 10.2 of [Quine] p. 65 (see ~ args ), this definition apparently does not appear in the literature. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffv4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cab(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), csn(cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cab(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), csn(cv(s0))))), cio(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), cuni(cab(s0, wceq(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), csn(cv(s0))))))
  dffv3(hs0, c0, c1)
  df-iota(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  unieqi(cab(s0, wceq(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), csn(cv(s0)))), cab(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), csn(cv(s0)))))
  abbii(s0, wceq(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), csn(cv(s0))))
  eqeq1i(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  abid2(hs0, cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, csn(c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dffv4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)= ‚ãÉ { s0 |(c0 " { c1 })= { s0 } }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri((c0 ` c1), ‚ãÉ { s0 |(c0 " { c1 })= { s0 } }, iota(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0 " { c1 })), ‚ãÉ { s0 | { hs0 | hs0 ‚àà(c0 " { c1 })} = { s0 } })
  dffv3(hs0, c0, c1)
  df-iota(hs0, s0, hs0 ‚àà(c0 " { c1 }))
  unieqi({ s0 | { hs0 | hs0 ‚àà(c0 " { c1 })} = { s0 } }, { s0 |(c0 " { c1 })= { s0 } })
  abbii(s0, { hs0 | hs0 ‚àà(c0 " { c1 })} = { s0 }, (c0 " { c1 })= { s0 })
  eqeq1i({ hs0 | hs0 ‚àà(c0 " { c1 })}, { s0 }, (c0 " { c1 }))
  abid2(hs0, (c0 " { c1 }))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (c0 " { c1 }))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, { c1 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 " { c1 }))
}

thm elfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cuni(cab(s0, wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  eleq2i(c0, cfv(c1, c2), cuni(cab(s0, wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  fv2(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  eluniab(s0, c0, wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 ` c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 ‚àà s0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1,(c2[c1]s1 ‚Üî s1 = s0)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà(c1 ` c2), ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 ‚àà s0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1,(c2[c1]s1 ‚Üî s1 = s0)))), c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ { s0 | ‚àÄ(s1,(c2[c1]s1 ‚Üî s1 = s0))})
  eleq2i(c0, (c1 ` c2), ‚ãÉ { s0 | ‚àÄ(s1,(c2[c1]s1 ‚Üî s1 = s0))})
  fv2(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  eluniab(s0, c0, ‚àÄ(s1,(c2[c1]s1 ‚Üî s1 = s0)))
}

}

blocks.name: elfvdm

blocks.name: elfvex

blocks.name: elfvexd

blocks.name: nfvres

blocks.name: fvfundmfvn0
blocks.content: If the "value of a class" at an argument is not the empty set, then the argument is in the domain of the class and the class restricted to the singleton formed on that argument is a function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 13-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: 0fv
blocks.content: Function value of the empty set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: fv2prc
blocks.content: A function value of a function value at a proper class is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: elfv2ex
blocks.content: If a function value of a function value has a member, then the first argument is a set. (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: fveqres
blocks.content: Equal values imply equal values in a restriction. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-1995.)

blocks.name: csbfv12

blocks.name: fnrnfv

  sylbi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), crn(cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))

blocks.name: fvelrnb

thm fvelrnb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  eleq2d(c2, crn(c0), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  fnrnfv(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  elab3(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))

  fvex(c0, cv(s0))
  eleq1(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2, universe)
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  eqcom(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: foelrni
blocks.content: A member of a surjective function's codomain is a value of the function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Jan-2020.)

thm foelrni(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  biimpa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  bitr3d(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(c3, crn(c0)))
  eleq2d(c3, crn(c0), c2, wfo(c0, c1, c2))
  forn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wb(wcel(c3, crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3))), wfn(c0, c1))
  fofn(c0, c1, c2)
  fvelrnb(s0, c0, c1, c3)
}

  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)= c3))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

} = {

blocks.name: dfimafn
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the image of a function. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)

thm dfimafn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wceq(cima(c0, c1), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6reqr(cima(c0, c1), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))))
  abbidv(s0, wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  rexbidva(s1, c1, wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  imp31(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  syl9r(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)))
  ssel(c1, cdm(c0), cv(s1))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  funbrfvb(c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  dfima2(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))

  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, cdm(c0))

  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
}

thm dfimafn2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  syl6eqr(cima(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c1, cab(hs0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))))
  dfimafn(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  iunab(s0, hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))

  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cab(hs0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  eqtri(csn(cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cab(hs0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  df-sn(hs0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  abbii(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

thm funimass4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))

  syl5bb(wa(wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0)), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  dfss2(hs0, cima(c0, c1), c2)
  syl6bb(wa(wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wal(hs0, wral(s0, c1, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  albidv(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wi(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  imbi1d(wa(wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  syl6rbbr(wa(wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))))
  rexbidva(s0, c1, wa(wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)))
  syl5bb(wa(wa(wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))

  vtoclg(hs0, c3, universe, wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(c3, cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))), wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wb(wcel(c3, cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3))))

  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  abeq2d(hs0, cima(c0, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl2an2r(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wceq(cima(c0, c2), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))), wfun(c0), wss(c2, cdm(c0)))

blocks.name: ssimaexg
blocks.content: The existence of a subimage. (Contributed by FL, 15-Apr-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssimaexg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))))))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))))), wi(wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, cv(hs0)))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, cv(hs0)))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))))), wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, cv(hs0))), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0)))
  sseq2d(c3, cima(c2, cv(hs0)), cima(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  ssimaex(s0, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))))))

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: funfv
blocks.content: A simplified expression for the value of a function when we know it is a function. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm funfv(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1)))))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(wfun(c0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1)))))
  syl5eqr(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1))), cuni(csn(cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  unisn(cfv(c0, c1))
  fvex(c0, c1)
  unieqd(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  sylanbr(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  mpbiran2(wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c0)))
  eqid(cdm(c0))
  df-fn(c0, cdm(c0))
  fnsnfv(c0, cdm(c0), c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1))), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  unieqd(cima(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  ndmima(c1, c0)
  uni0()
}

  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(‚ãÉ(c0 " { c1 }), emptycls, ‚ãÉ ‚àÖ, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  unieqd((c0 " { c1 }), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  ndmima(c1, c0)
  uni0()
}

}

thm fvun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), cuni(cima(cun(c0, c1), csn(c2))), cuni(cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2)))), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)))
  syl(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)), wceq(cfv(cun(c0, c1), c2), cuni(cima(cun(c0, c1), csn(c2)))), wfun(cun(c0, c1)))
  funun(c0, c1)
  funfv(cun(c0, c1), c2)
  unieqd(cima(cun(c0, c1), csn(c2)), cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2))), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)), wceq(cima(cun(c0, c1), csn(c2)), cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2)))))
  imaundir(c0, c1, csn(c2))
  syl5eq(cuni(cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2)))), cun(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), cun(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2)))), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)))
  uniun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2)))
  syl(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)), wceq(cun(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2)))), cun(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))), wa(wceq(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2))))
  adantr(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls), wa(wceq(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2))))
  anim12i(wfun(c0), wfun(c1), wceq(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2)))
  eqcomd(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2), wfun(c0))
  funfv(c0, c2)
  eqcomd(cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2), wfun(c1))
  funfv(c1, c2)
  uneq12(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2), cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2))
}

thm fvun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c1))‚àß(dom(c0)‚ãÇ dom(c1))= ‚àÖ)‚Üí((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)` c2)=((c0 ` c2)‚ãÉ(c1 ` c2)))
} = {

  syl(((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c1))‚àß(dom(c0)‚ãÇ dom(c1))= ‚àÖ), ((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)` c2)= ‚ãÉ((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)" { c2 }), Fun((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)))

  imaundir(c0, c1, { c2 })
  syl5eq(‚ãÉ((c0 " { c2 })‚ãÉ(c1 " { c2 })), ((c0 ` c2)‚ãÉ(c1 ` c2)), (‚ãÉ(c0 " { c2 })‚ãÉ ‚ãÉ(c1 " { c2 })), ((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c1))‚àß(dom(c0)‚ãÇ dom(c1))= ‚àÖ))
  uniun((c0 " { c2 }), (c1 " { c2 }))
  syl(((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c1))‚àß(dom(c0)‚ãÇ dom(c1))= ‚àÖ), (‚ãÉ(c0 " { c2 })‚ãÉ ‚ãÉ(c1 " { c2 }))=((c0 ` c2)‚ãÉ(c1 ` c2)), (‚ãÉ(c0 " { c2 })=(c0 ` c2)‚àß ‚ãÉ(c1 " { c2 })=(c1 ` c2)))
  adantr((Fun(c0)‚àß Fun(c1)), (dom(c0)‚ãÇ dom(c1))= ‚àÖ, (‚ãÉ(c0 " { c2 })=(c0 ` c2)‚àß ‚ãÉ(c1 " { c2 })=(c1 ` c2)))

}

  uneq2d(cfv(c0, c4), cfv(c2, c4), emptycls, w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1))))
  syl(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(c2, c4), emptycls), wn(wcel(c4, cdm(c2))))

  unieqd(cuni(cdif(ccom(cres(c0, csn(c1)), ccnv(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), cid)), emptycls, wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))))

  sylib(wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wceq(cdif(ccom(cres(c0, csn(c1)), ccnv(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), cid), emptycls), wss(ccom(cres(c0, csn(c1)), ccnv(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), cid))

thm dmfco(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0))‚Üí(c1 ‚àà dom((c2 ‚àò c0))‚Üî(c0 ` c1)‚àà dom(c2)))
} = {
  bitr4d((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), c1 ‚àà dom((c2 ‚àò c0)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà dom(c2), ‚àÉ(hs1, ‚àÉ(hs0,(< c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2))))
  adantl(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c1 ‚àà dom((c2 ‚àò c0))‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1, ‚àÉ(hs0,(< c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2)))))
  bitrd(c1 ‚àà dom(c0), c1 ‚àà dom((c2 ‚àò c0)), ‚àÉ(hs1, ‚àÉ(hs0,(< c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2))), ‚àÉ(hs1, < c1, hs1 > ‚àà(c2 ‚àò c0)))
  eldm2g(hs1, c1, dom(c0), (c2 ‚àò c0))

  elvd(hs1, c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (< c1, hs1 > ‚àà(c2 ‚àò c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0,(< c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2))))
  opelco2g(hs0, c1, dom(c0), hs1, universe, c2, c0)
  syl5bb((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà dom(c2), ‚àÉ(hs1, ‚àÉ(hs0,(< c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2))), ‚àÉ(hs1, <(c0 ` c1), hs1 > ‚àà c2))
  eldm2(hs1, (c0 ` c1), c2)
  exbidv(hs1, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), <(c0 ` c1), hs1 > ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs0,(< c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2)))
  syl5bbr((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), <(c0 ` c1), hs1 > ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs0,(< c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2)), ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 =(c0 ` c1)‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2)))
  ceqsexv(hs0, (c0 ` c1), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2, <(c0 ` c1), hs1 > ‚àà c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  eleq1d(< hs0, hs1 >, c2, <(c0 ` c1), hs1 >, hs0 =(c0 ` c1))
  opeq1(hs0, (c0 ` c1), hs1)
  exbidv(hs0, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), (hs0 =(c0 ` c1)‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2), (< c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2))
  anbi1d((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), hs0 =(c0 ` c1), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c2, < c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0)
  syl5bb((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), hs0 =(c0 ` c1), < c1, hs0 > ‚àà c0, (c0 ` c1)= hs0)
  eqcom(hs0, (c0 ` c1))
  funopfvb(c0, c1, hs0)

thm fvco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), c2), cfv(c3, cfv(c0, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), c2), cfv(c3, cfv(c0, c2)), cio(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccom(c3, c0), csn(c2)))), cio(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2))))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  iotabidv(hs0, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccom(c3, c0), csn(c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2)))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cima(ccom(c3, c0), csn(c2)), cima(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  syl6reqr(cima(ccom(c3, c0), csn(c2)), cima(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2))), cima(c3, cima(c0, csn(c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  imaeq2d(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2)), cima(c0, csn(c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  fnsnfv(c0, c1, c2)
  imaco(c3, c0, csn(c2))
  dffv3(hs0, ccom(c3, c0), c2)
  dffv3(hs0, c3, cfv(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c3, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c2))
}

thm fvco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((c3 ‚àò c0)` c2)=(c3 `(c0 ` c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(((c3 ‚àò c0)` c2), (c3 `(c0 ` c2)), iota(hs0, hs0 ‚àà((c3 ‚àò c0)" { c2 })), iota(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c3 " {(c0 ` c2)})), (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  iotabidv(hs0, (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà((c3 ‚àò c0)" { c2 }), hs0 ‚àà(c3 " {(c0 ` c2)}))
  eleq2d(hs0, ((c3 ‚àò c0)" { c2 }), (c3 " {(c0 ` c2)}), (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  syl6reqr(((c3 ‚àò c0)" { c2 }), (c3 " {(c0 ` c2)}), (c3 "(c0 " { c2 })), (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
