thm fvco4i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(emptycls, cfv(c0, emptycls))
  -| wfun(c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  mpan(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wfn(c1, cdm(c1)))
  mpbi(wfn(c1, cdm(c1)), wfun(c1))
  funfn(c1)
  fvco2(c1, cdm(c1), c2, c0)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), emptycls, cfv(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))))
  syl(wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, cdm(ccom(c0, c1)))))
  con3i(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, cdm(ccom(c0, c1))))
  sseli(c2, cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1))
  dmcoss(c0, c1)
  ndmfv(c2, ccom(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(c0, cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))))
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àò c1)` c2)=(c0 `(c1 ` c2))

blocks.name: fvopab3g
blocks.content: Value of a function given by ordered-pair class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)

thm fvopab3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), w0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), weu(s1, w1))
  -| wceq(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0))
  opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w2))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1, wcel(c0, c1), w2)
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c0, c1), w2, w0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4)), wfn(c4, c1))
  fnopab(s0, s1, c4, c1, w1)
  fnopfvb(c4, c1, c0, c2)
  eleq2i(cop(c0, c2), c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0)))

  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w0)

  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), w0)

thm fvopab3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí((c4 ` c0)= c2 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c2 ‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w0))

  ‚ä£ c4 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)}

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c4 ` c0)= c2, w0, < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)}, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0))
  opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w2))
  anbi12d(s0 = c0, s0 ‚àà c1, w1, c0 ‚àà c1, w2)
  eleq1(s0, c0, c1)
  anbi2d(s1 = c2, c0 ‚àà c1, w2, w0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, ((c4 ` c0)= c2 ‚Üî < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)}))
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà c1, (c4 ` c0)= c2, < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)}, < c0, c2 > ‚àà c4)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà c1, ((c4 ` c0)= c2 ‚Üî < c0, c2 > ‚àà c4), c4[Fn]c1)
  fnopab(s0, s1, c4, c1, w1)
  fnopfvb(c4, c1, c0, c2)
  eleq2i(< c0, c2 >, c4, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)})

thm fvopab3ig(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {

} = {

  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))))
  opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w2))

  fveq1i(c4, c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  ax-mp(wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), wceq(cfv(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), c0), c2)), wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))))
  mpgbir(s0, wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  funopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))
  mpbir(wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wmo(s1, w1)))
  moanimv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)
  funopfv(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)

  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)

thm fvopab3ig(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(w0 ‚Üí(c4 ` c0)= c2))

  imp(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (w0 ‚Üí < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)}))

  biimpar((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)})
  opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w2))

  fveq1i(c4, c0, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)})

  mpgbir(s0, Fun({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)}), ‚àÉ*(s1,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)))

blocks.name: brfvopabrbr
blocks.content: The binary relation of a function value which is an ordered-pair class abstraction of a restricted binary relation is the restricted binary relation. The first hypothesis can often be obtained by using ~ fvmptopab . (Contributed by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)

thm brfvopabrbr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), w0))
  -| wceq(cfv(c1, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c4, c2), cv(s1)), w1)))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c3)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wrel(cfv(c4, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), w0), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  3jca(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
  brne0(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3)
  necon1ai(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, wcel(c2, universe))
  fvprc(c2, c1)
  brrelex1i(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3)
  brrelex2i(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3)
  relopabi(s0, s1, cfv(c1, c2), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c4, c2), cv(s1)), w1))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), w0, w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  3jca(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe), wne(cfv(c4, c2), emptycls))
  brne0(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3)
  necon1ai(cfv(c4, c2), emptycls, wcel(c2, universe))
  fvprc(c2, c4)
  brrelex1i(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3)
  brrelex2i(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3)
  rbropap(s0, s1, c0, universe, c3, universe, cfv(c1, c2), cfv(c4, c2), wcel(c2, universe), w0, w1)
  a1i(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c4, c2), cv(s1)), w1))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c4, c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0[(c1 ` c2)]c3 ‚Üî(c0[(c4 ` c2)]c3 ‚àß w0))

  brrelex2i(c0, (c1 ` c2), c3)
  relopabi(s0, s1, (c1 ` c2), (s0[(c4 ` c2)]s1 ‚àß w1))
  adantr(c0[(c4 ` c2)]c3, w0, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  3jca(c0[(c4 ` c2)]c3, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)

  a1i(c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c1 ` c2)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c4 ` c2)]s1 ‚àß w1)})
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c4, c2)

thm fvmptg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  fvopab3ig(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, wceq(c2, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c5, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, c2)
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wmo(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))
  moeq(hs0, c5)
  eqtri(c4, copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))), cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c2, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

thm fvmpti(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cid, c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c4, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cid, c3)), wcel(c3, universe))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cid, c3), c3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3, universe, c2, c4)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(cfv(cid, c3), c3))
  fvi(c3, universe)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cid, c3), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe))))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), emptycls))
  syl6bir(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c2))))
  notbid(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)), wcel(c3, universe))
  baib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)), wcel(c3, universe))
  elrab2(s0, c0, cdm(c2), c1, wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  eleq1d(c4, universe, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  dmmpt(s0, c2, c1, c4)
  ndmfv(c0, c2)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cfv(cid, c3), emptycls))
  fvprc(c3, cid)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmpti(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(= ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c4 = c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ` c0)=(= ` c3), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqtr4d((c2 ` c0), (= ` c3), c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  fvmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3, universe, c2, c4)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà ùïå, (= ` c3)= c3)
  fvi(c3, universe)
  eqtr4d((c2 ` c0), (= ` c3), emptycls, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  imp(c0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå, (c2 ` c0)= ‚àÖ)
  syl6bir(c0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå, (c2 ` c0)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà dom(c2))
  notbid(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà dom(c2), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  baib(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà dom(c2), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  elrab2(s0, c0, dom(c2), c1, c3 ‚àà ùïå, c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  eleq1d(c4, universe, c3, s0 = c0)
  dmmpt(s0, c2, c1, c4)
  ndmfv(c0, c2)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå, (= ` c3)= ‚àÖ)
  fvprc(c3, cid)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm fvmpt2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmptg(hs0, cv(s0), c0, c1, c2, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1, csb(s0, cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0), c1)
  csbid(s0, c1)
  cbvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm fvmpt2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)` s0)= c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmptg(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), [hs0 / s0]c1)
  syl6eq([hs0 / s0]c1, c1, [s0 / s0]c1, hs0 = s0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, s0, c1)
  csbid(s0, c1)
  cbvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

}

blocks.name: fvmpts
blocks.content: Value of a function given in maps-to notation, using explicit class substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmpts(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csb(s0, c0, c2), c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3, c4, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  eqtri(c4, cmpt(hs0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c1, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmpts(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß[c0 / s0]c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ` c0)=[c0 / s0]c2)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, c1, [c0 / s0]c2, c3, c4, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  eqtri(c4, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶[hs0 / s0]c2), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c1, c2, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0]c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmpt3
blocks.content: Value of a function given in maps-to notation, with a slightly different sethood condition. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmpt3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c4, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c4, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  mpdan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wcel(c3, c5))
  vtoclga(s0, c0, c1, wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  eleq1d(c4, c5, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fvmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3, c5, c2, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmpt3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)= c3)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c4 = c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ` c0)= c3, c3 ‚àà c5)
  vtoclga(s0, c0, c1, c3 ‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà c5)
  eleq1d(c4, c5, c3, s0 = c0)
  fvmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3, c5, c2, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c5)
}

blocks.name: fvmptd
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ fvmpt . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c3, c4), c1), csb(s0, c1, c4), w0)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, cmpt(s0, c3, c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c3, c4), c1), csb(s0, c1, c4)), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(csb(s0, c1, c4), c5))
  eqeltrd(csb(s0, c1, c4), c5, c2, w0)
  fvmpts(s0, c1, c3, c4, c5, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  csbied(s0, c1, c4, c2, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c1)‚Üí c4 = c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0 ` c1), c2, ((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4)` c1), [c1 / s0]c4, w0)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4)` c1)=[c1 / s0]c4, c1 ‚àà c3, [c1 / s0]c4 ‚àà c5)
  eqeltrd([c1 / s0]c4, c5, c2, w0)
  fvmpts(s0, c1, c3, c4, c5, (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  csbied(s0, c1, c4, c2, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptd2
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ fvmpt (where the definition of the mapping does not depend on the common antecedent ` ph ` ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptd2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  fvmptd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c4)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptd2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c1)‚Üí c4 = c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  fvmptd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  a1i(w0, c0 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4))
}

blocks.name: mptrcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for a mapping: If the function value of a mapping has a member, the argument belongs to the base class of the mapping. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)

thm fvmpt2i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

  csbid(s0, c2)

  ‚ä¢ (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c1 ` s0)=(= ` c2))

blocks.name: fvmptss
blocks.content: If all the values of the mapping are subsets of a class ` C ` , then so is any evaluation of the mapping, even if ` D ` is not in the base set ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2), wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))
  sylan2(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cdm(c3)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2), wcel(c4, c0))
  sseli(c4, cdm(c3), c0)
  dmmptss(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  impcom(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c0), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2))
  vtoclga(hs0, c4, c0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2))
  sseq1d(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(c3, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c3)
  vtoclgaf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2)))
  nfim(s0, wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2))
  nfra1(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))
  nfss(s0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2)
  nffv(s0, c3, cv(hs0))
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2))
  sseq1d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c3)
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2))
  syl5ss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))))
  pm2.61i(wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c3)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c3)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe)))
  rabeq2i(s0, cdm(c3), c0, wcel(c1, universe))
  dmmpt(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, universe, c3)
  eqimss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1)
  syl6eqss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c3))))
  ndmfv(cv(s0), c3)
  0ss(c1)
  impcom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(c1, c2))
  rsp(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))
  syl6eqss(cfv(c3, c4), c2, emptycls, wa(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))))
  adantl(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c4, cdm(c3))), wceq(cfv(c3, c4), emptycls))
  ndmfv(c4, c3)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm fvmptss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ` c4)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 ` c4)‚äÜ c2, c4 ‚àà dom(c3))
  sylan2(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), c4 ‚àà dom(c3), (c3 ` c4)‚äÜ c2, c4 ‚àà c0)
  sseli(c4, dom(c3), c0)
  dmmptss(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  impcom(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), c4 ‚àà c0, (c3 ` c4)‚äÜ c2)
  vtoclga(hs0, c4, c0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ` c4)‚äÜ c2), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ` hs0)‚äÜ c2))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c4, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 ` hs0)‚äÜ c2, (c3 ` c4)‚äÜ c2)
  sseq1d((c3 ` hs0), c2, (c3 ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, c3)
  vtoclgaf(s0, hs0, c0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ` hs0)‚äÜ c2), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ` s0)‚äÜ c2))
  nfim(s0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 ` hs0)‚äÜ c2)
  nfra1(s0, c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  nfss(s0, (c3 ` hs0), c2)
  nffv(s0, c3, hs0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  imbi2d(s0 = hs0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 ` s0)‚äÜ c2, (c3 ` hs0)‚äÜ c2)
  sseq1d((c3 ` s0), c2, (c3 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c3)
  ex(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 ` s0)‚äÜ c2)
  syl5ss((c3 ` s0), c2, c1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)))
  pm2.61i((c3 ` s0)‚äÜ c1, s0 ‚àà dom(c3))
  sylbi(s0 ‚àà dom(c3), (c3 ` s0)‚äÜ c1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  rabeq2i(s0, dom(c3), c0, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  dmmpt(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  syl((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), (c3 ` s0)‚äÜ c1, (c3 ` s0)= c1)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, universe, c3)
  eqimss((c3 ` s0), c1)
  syl6eqss((c3 ` s0), c1, emptycls, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà dom(c3))
  ndmfv(s0, c3)
  0ss(c1)
  impcom(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  rsp(s0, c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  syl6eqss((c3 ` c4), c2, emptycls, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚àß ¬¨ c4 ‚àà dom(c3)))
  adantl(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà dom(c3), (c3 ` c4)= ‚àÖ)
  ndmfv(c4, c3)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ` c4)‚äÜ c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmpt2d
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ fvmpt2 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmpt2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0))))
  fveq1d(c1, cv(s0), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  syl2an2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c3))
  id(wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c2, c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmpt2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c1 ` s0)= c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 =(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c1 ` s0), c2, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)` s0), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, (c1 ` s0)=((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)` s0))
  fveq1d(c1, s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), w0)
  syl2an2(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)` s0)= c2, s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà c3)
  id(s0 ‚àà c0)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c2, c3, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))
}

blocks.name: fvmptex
blocks.content: Express a function ` F ` whose value ` B ` may not always be a set in terms of another function ` G ` for which sethood is guaranteed. (Note that ` ( _I `` B ) ` is just shorthand for ` if ( B e. _V , B , (/) ) ` , and it is always a set by ~ fvex .) Note also that these functions are not the same; wherever ` B ( C ) ` is not a set, ` C ` is not in the domain of ` F ` (so it evaluates to the empty set), but ` C ` is in the domain of ` G ` , and ` G ( C ) ` is defined to be the empty set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cid, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, c3))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1), cfv(cid, csb(s0, c1, c4)), wcel(c1, c3))
  fvmpti(hs0, c1, c3, c0, csb(s0, c1, c4), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4)), cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, c4, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4))
  nfcv(hs0, c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, c3, c2, cfv(cid, csb(s0, c1, c4)), cfv(cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4)))
  fveq2d(cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4), csb(s0, c1, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c1, c4)
  eqtri(c2, cmpt(hs0, c3, cfv(cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4))), cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cid, c4)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, cfv(cid, c4), cfv(cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4)))
  nfcv(hs0, cfv(cid, c4))
  nffv(s0, cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4))
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  fveq2d(cid, c4, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  fvex(cid, csb(s0, c1, c4))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, c3)))
  syl(wn(wcel(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  con3i(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sseli(c1, cdm(c0), c3)
  dmmptss(s0, c0, c3, c4)
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  sylnbir(wcel(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), emptycls), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)))
  eleq2i(c1, cdm(c2), c3)
  dmmpti(s0, c2, c3, cfv(cid, c4))
  fvex(cid, c4)
  ndmfv(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c1, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cid, csb(s0, c1, c4)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cid, c4))
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)=(c2 ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(= ` c4))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ` c1)=(c2 ` c1), c1 ‚àà c3)
  eqtr4d((c0 ` c1), (c2 ` c1), (= `[c1 / s0]c4), c1 ‚àà c3)
  fvmpti(hs0, c1, c3, c0, [c1 / s0]c4, [hs0 / s0]c4)
  eqtri(c0, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶[hs0 / s0]c4), (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, c4, [hs0 / s0]c4)
  nfcv(hs0, c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, c3, c2, (= `[c1 / s0]c4), (= `[hs0 / s0]c4))
  fveq2d(cid, [hs0 / s0]c4, [c1 / s0]c4, hs0 = c1)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c1, c4)
  eqtri(c2, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(= `[hs0 / s0]c4)), (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(= ` c4)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, (= ` c4), (= `[hs0 / s0]c4))
  nfcv(hs0, (= ` c4))
  nffv(s0, cid, [hs0 / s0]c4)
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c4)
  fveq2d(cid, c4, [hs0 / s0]c4, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c4)
  fvex(cid, [c1 / s0]c4)
  eqtr4d((c0 ` c1), (c2 ` c1), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà c3)
  syl(¬¨ c1 ‚àà c3, (c0 ` c1)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  con3i(c1 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  sseli(c1, dom(c0), c3)
  dmmptss(s0, c0, c3, c4)
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  sylnbir(c1 ‚àà c3, (c2 ` c1)= ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà dom(c2))
  eleq2i(c1, dom(c2), c3)
  dmmpti(s0, c2, c3, (= ` c4))
  fvex(cid, c4)
  ndmfv(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c([c1 / s0]c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((= `[c1 / s0]c4))
  diff.hs0.c((= ` c4))
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptd3f
blocks.content: Alternate deduction version of ~ fvmpt with three non-freeness hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by AV, 19-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptd3f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c2), w1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  exlimdd(s0, w0, wi(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  nfim(s0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1)
  nfeq(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c2)
  sylib(w0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(c3, universe))
  elexd(c3, c1, w0)
  isset(s0, c3)
  syl5(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1, wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)))
  fveq1(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)
  sylbid(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)), w1, wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c2))
  eqeq2d(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3), c2, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  fveq2d(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0), c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, c4))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c1, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c3, c1))
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c2, c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptd3f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚Üí w1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c3)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c3)‚Üí((c0 ` c3)= c2 ‚Üí w1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  exlimdd(s0, w0, (c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚Üí w1), s0 = c3)
  nfim(s0, c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), w1)
  nfeq(s0, c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c2)
  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = c3), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  elexd(c3, c1, w0)
  isset(s0, c3)
  syl5((w0 ‚àß s0 = c3), c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), w1, (c0 ` c3)=((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` c3))
  fveq1(c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), c3)
  sylbid((w0 ‚àß s0 = c3), (c0 ` c3)=((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` c3), w1, (c0 ` c3)= c2)
  eqeq2d((c0 ` c3), ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` c3), c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 = c3))
  eqtr3d(((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` c3), c2, ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` s0), (w0 ‚àß s0 = c3))
  fveq2d((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), s0, c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 = c3))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s0 = c3), ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` s0)= c2, s0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c4)
  eqeltrd(s0, c1, c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 = c3))
  simpr(w0, s0 = c3)
  adantr(w0, s0 = c3, c3 ‚àà c1)
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c2, c4, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
}

blocks.name: fvmptdf
blocks.content: Alternate deduction version of ~ fvmpt , suitable for iteration. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 19-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c2), w1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

thm mpteqb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, universe))

  impbid1(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3)))
  com12(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3)))
  mpdd(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c3, universe)))
  biimpd(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c3, universe)))
  3bitr4g(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c3, universe)), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0))
  fneq1(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0)
  mptfng(s0, c0, c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  mptfng(s0, c0, c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  expd(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c3, universe)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3)))
  syl5bir(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c3, universe))), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))))
  r19.26(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(c1, c3))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  nfeq(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c3)
  exp31(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(c1, c3))
  3eqtr3d(c1, c3, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), cv(s0)), wa(wa(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))))
  fveq1d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0), cmpt(s0, c0, c3), wa(wa(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))))
  simpll(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  ad2ant2lr(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, universe, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  ad2ant2l(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), cv(s0)), c3))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c3, universe, cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  ralim(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(c1, c3))
  mpan(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), wceq(c0, c0))

  syl5bir((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)=(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c3), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà ùïå)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = c3), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)))

thm fvmptt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5))), wceq(cfv(c3, c0), c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c3, c0), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), w3a(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5))))
  fveq1d(c3, c0, cmpt(s0, c4, c1), w3a(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5))))
  simp2(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5)))
  3adant2(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))
  imp32(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))
  syl5bi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, c4), wi(wcel(c2, c5), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  risset(s0, c0, c4)
  syl7(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c5), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c5)
  rexlimd(s0, c4, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)))
  nfa1(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)))
  nfim(s0, wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))

  nfeq1(s0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)
  nffvmpt1(s0, c4, c1, c0)
  sps(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)))))
  com23(wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)))
  a2i(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))))
  exp43(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))
  3eqtr3d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cv(s0)), c1, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c1, universe))
  simprl(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))
  eqeltrd(c1, universe, c2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))))
  simprr(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvmpt2(s0, c4, c1, universe, cmpt(s0, c4, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c4, c1))
  fveq2d(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cv(s0), c0, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))))
  simpll(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe)))
  simplr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2))‚àß c3 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c5))‚Üí(c3 ` c0)= c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd((c3 ` c0), c2, ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2))‚àß c3 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c5)))
  fveq1d(c3, c0, (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2))‚àß c3 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c5)))
  simp2(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2)), c3 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1), (c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c5))
  3adant2(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2)), c3 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1), (c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c5), ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2)
  imp32(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2)), c0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c5, ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2)
  syl5bi(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2)), c0 ‚àà c4, (c2 ‚àà c5 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, s0 = c0))
  risset(s0, c0, c4)
  syl7(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, s0 = c0), c2 ‚àà c5, ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c2, c5)
  rexlimd(s0, c4, ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2)), s0 = c0, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2))
  nfa1(s0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2))
  nfim(s0, c2 ‚àà ùïå, ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2)
  nfv(s0, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  nfeq1(s0, ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0), c2)
  nffvmpt1(s0, c4, c1, c0)
  sps(s0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2), (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Üí(s0 = c0 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2))))
  com23((s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2), s0 ‚àà c4, s0 = c0, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2))
  a2i(s0 = c0, c1 = c2, (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2)))
  exp43(s0 = c0, c1 = c2, s0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà ùïå, ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0)= c2)
  3eqtr3d(((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` c0), c2, ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` s0), c1, ((s0 = c0 ‚àß c1 = c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå)))
  syl2anc(((s0 = c0 ‚àß c1 = c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå)), ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)` s0)= c1, s0 ‚àà c4, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  simprl((s0 = c0 ‚àß c1 = c2), s0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltrd(c1, universe, c2, ((s0 = c0 ‚àß c1 = c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå)))
  simprr((s0 = c0 ‚àß c1 = c2), s0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt2(s0, c4, c1, universe, (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  fveq2d((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1), s0, c0, ((s0 = c0 ‚àß c1 = c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå)))
  simpll(s0 = c0, c1 = c2, (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  simplr(s0 = c0, c1 = c2, (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptf
blocks.content: Value of a function given by an ordered-pair class abstraction. This version of ~ fvmptg uses bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impel(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  vtoclgaf(s0, c0, c1, wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2)), wi(wcel(c5, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5)))
  nfim(s0, wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  nfel1(s0, c2, universe)
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c4, c0), c2)
  nffv(s0, c4, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c5)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c5, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  eleq1d(c5, universe, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c4, c0), c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c0, c4)
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c5, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5))
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c5, universe, c4)
  elex(c2, c3)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ` c0)= c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c5 = c2)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impel(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c4 ` c0)= c2, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  vtoclgaf(s0, c0, c1, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(c4 ` c0)= c2), (c5 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(c4 ` s0)= c5))
  nfim(s0, c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c4 ` c0)= c2)
  nfel1(s0, c2, universe)
  nfeq(s0, (c4 ` c0), c2)
  nffv(s0, c4, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c5))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c5)
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, c5 ‚àà ùïå, (c4 ` s0)= c5, c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c4 ` c0)= c2)
  eleq1d(c5, universe, c2, s0 = c0)
  eqeq12d((c4 ` s0), c5, (c4 ` c0), c2, s0 = c0)
  fveq2(s0, c0, c4)
  ex(s0 ‚àà c1, c5 ‚àà ùïå, (c4 ` s0)= c5)
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c5, universe, c4)
  elex(c2, c3)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptnf
blocks.content: The value of a function given by an ordered-pair class abstraction is the empty set when the class it would otherwise map to is a proper class. This version of ~ fvmptn uses bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c3, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c4, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm2.61d1(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  syl5(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, c4))
  sseli(c2, cdm(c1), c4)
  dmmptss(s0, c1, c4, c3)
  expcom(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c2, c4), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
  sylan9eq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, cfv(cid, c0), wcel(c2, c4), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl5eq(cfv(c1, c2), cfv(cid, c0), cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)), c2), wcel(c2, c4))
  fvmptex(s0, c1, c2, cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)), c4, c3)
  mpan2(wcel(c2, c4), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)), c2), cfv(cid, c0)), wcel(cfv(cid, c0), universe))
  fvex(cid, c0)
  fvmptf(s0, c2, c4, cfv(cid, c0), universe, cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)), cfv(cid, c3))
  nffv(s0, cid, c0)
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  fveq2d(cid, c3, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)))
  fvprc(c0, cid)
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(c1 ` c2)= ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c2 ‚Üí c3 = c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm2.61d1(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, (c1 ` c2)= ‚àÖ, c2 ‚àà dom(c1))
  syl5(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà dom(c1), (c1 ` c2)= ‚àÖ, c2 ‚àà c4)
  sseli(c2, dom(c1), c4)
  dmmptss(s0, c1, c4, c3)
  expcom(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà c4, (c1 ` c2)= ‚àÖ)
  sylan9eq((c1 ` c2), emptycls, (= ` c0), c2 ‚àà c4, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq((c1 ` c2), (= ` c0), ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(= ` c3))` c2), c2 ‚àà c4)
  fvmptex(s0, c1, c2, (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(= ` c3)), c4, c3)
  mpan2(c2 ‚àà c4, ((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(= ` c3))` c2)=(= ` c0), (= ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cid, c0)
  fvmptf(s0, c2, c4, (= ` c0), universe, (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(= ` c3)), (= ` c3))
  nffv(s0, cid, c0)
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  fveq2d(cid, c3, c0, s0 = c2)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(= ` c3)))
  fvprc(c0, cid)
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptd3
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ fvmpt . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: fvmptn
blocks.content: This somewhat non-intuitive theorem tells us the value of its function is the empty set when the class ` C ` it would otherwise map to is a proper class. This is a technical lemma that can help eliminate redundant sethood antecedents otherwise required by ~ fvmptg . (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: fvmptss2
blocks.content: A mapping always evaluates to a subset of the substituted expression in the mapping, even if this is a proper class, or we are out of the domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c4, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sylbi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, universe)))
  elrab2(s0, c1, cdm(c0), c4, wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  eleq1d(c3, universe, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c4, c3)
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, universe)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  fvmptg(s0, c1, c4, c2, universe, c0, c3)
  eqimss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  syl6eqss(cfv(c0, c1), c2, emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)‚äÜ c2
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c1 ‚Üí c3 = c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ` c1)‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  sylbi(c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c0 ` c1)‚äÜ c2, (c1 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  elrab2(s0, c1, dom(c0), c4, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  eleq1d(c3, universe, c2, s0 = c1)
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c4, c3)
  syl((c1 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå), (c0 ` c1)‚äÜ c2, (c0 ` c1)= c2)
  fvmptg(s0, c1, c4, c2, universe, c0, c3)
  eqimss((c0 ` c1), c2)
  syl6eqss((c0 ` c1), c2, emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elfvmptrab1
blocks.content: Implications for the value of a function defined by the maps-to notation with a class abstraction as a result having an element. Here, the base set of the class abstraction depends on the argument of the function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfvmptrab1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, c3, crab(s2, csb(s0, cv(s1), c4), w0)))
  -| wi(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(csb(s0, c2, c4), universe))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  pm2.43i(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4))))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4)))), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  ne0i(c0, cfv(c1, c2))
  necon1ai(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
  sylbid(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4))), wcel(c0, crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(c1, c2), crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0)), universe))

thm fvopab6(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {

blocks.origin:
thm eqfnfvd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, c2), wfn(c1, c2))

thm eqfnfvd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[Fn]c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[Fn]c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 = c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, (c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 = c1 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))), c0[Fn]c2, c1[Fn]c2)
  eqfnfv(s0, c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: eqfnfv2f
blocks.content: Equality of functions is determined by their values. Special case of Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 28 (with domain equality omitted). This version of ~ eqfnfv uses bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2004.)

thm eqfnfv2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))

} = {

  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  cbvral(hs0, s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nffv(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s1)= c3)))

  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s1)= c3))), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s1)= c3))), d(s1, c4))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s1)= c3))), d(s1, c5))
  3bitrd(w0, c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s1)= c3), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s1)=((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s1)=((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3)` s1)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s1)=((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` s1))), c0[Fn]c1, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)[Fn]c1)

blocks.name: fndmdif
blocks.content: Two ways to express the locus of differences between two functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)

thm fndmdif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  eldm(hs0, s0, (c0 \ c2))

  syl5bb((c2[Fn]c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0), s0[c2](c0 ` s0), (c2 ` s0)=(c0 ` s0))
  eqcom((c0 ` s0), (c2 ` s0))

  anbi1d(((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2[Fn]c1)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), hs0 =(c0 ` s0), ¬¨ s0[c2]hs0, s0[c0]hs0)

blocks.name: fndmdifcom
blocks.content: The difference set between two functions is commutative. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: fndmdifeq0
blocks.content: The difference set of two functions is empty if and only if the functions are equal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  fndmdif(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  syl6rbbr(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(crab(hs0, c1, wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), emptycls), wceq(c0, c2), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c1, c2)

  rabeq0(hs0, c1, wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  ralbii(hs0, c1, wn(wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  nne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))

  mpbird(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2))
  sylan2(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  snssi(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
  funimass2(c0, csn(c1), c2)
  syl5bb(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2))
  snss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  sseq1d(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2, cima(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  sylan2(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sseli(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cdm(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, c2)
  sylanb(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  funfn(c0)
  fnsnfv(c0, cdm(c0), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvimacnvi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà c2)
} = {
  mpbird((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, (c0 " { c1 })‚äÜ c2)
  sylan2(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2), (c0 " { c1 })‚äÜ c2, { c1 } ‚äÜ(`' c0 " c2))
  snssi(c1, (`' c0 " c2))
  funimass2(c0, { c1 }, c2)
  syl5bb((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, (c0 " { c1 })‚äÜ c2, {(c0 ` c1)} ‚äÜ c2)
  snss((c0 ` c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  sseq1d({(c0 ` c1)}, c2, (c0 " { c1 }), (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  sylan2(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2), {(c0 ` c1)} =(c0 " { c1 }), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  sseli(c1, (`' c0 " c2), dom(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, c2)
  sylanb(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), {(c0 ` c1)} =(c0 " { c1 }), c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  funfn(c0)
  fnsnfv(c0, dom(c0), c1)
}

blocks.name: fvimacnv
blocks.content: The argument of a function value belongs to the preimage of any class containing the function value. Raph Levien remarks: "This proof is unsatisfying, because it seems to me that ~ funimass2 could probably be strengthened to a biconditional." (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  syl5com(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))))
  mpbird(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0))
  funfvop(c0, c1)
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0)))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), universe))
  opelcnvg(cfv(c0, c1), universe, c1, cdm(c0), c0)
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0))))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), universe))
  elimasng(cfv(c0, c1), universe, c1, cdm(c0), ccnv(c0))
  sseld(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1))), cima(ccnv(c0), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  sylbi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1))), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2))
  snss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  imass2(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2, ccnv(c0))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wi(wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2)))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  fvimacnvi(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0))‚Üí((c0 ` c1)‚àà c2 ‚Üî c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
} = {
  impbid((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))
  syl5com((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2), c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " {(c0 ` c1)}))
  mpbird((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " {(c0 ` c1)}), <(c0 ` c1), c1 > ‚àà `' c0)
  mpbird((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), <(c0 ` c1), c1 > ‚àà `' c0, < c1,(c0 ` c1)> ‚àà c0)
  funfvop(c0, c1)
  adantl(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (<(c0 ` c1), c1 > ‚àà `' c0 ‚Üî < c1,(c0 ` c1)> ‚àà c0))
  mpan(c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (<(c0 ` c1), c1 > ‚àà `' c0 ‚Üî < c1,(c0 ` c1)> ‚àà c0), (c0 ` c1)‚àà ùïå)
  opelcnvg((c0 ` c1), universe, c1, dom(c0), c0)
  adantl(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " {(c0 ` c1)})‚Üî <(c0 ` c1), c1 > ‚àà `' c0))
  mpan(c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " {(c0 ` c1)})‚Üî <(c0 ` c1), c1 > ‚àà `' c0), (c0 ` c1)‚àà ùïå)
  elimasng((c0 ` c1), universe, c1, dom(c0), `' c0)
  sseld(c1, (`' c0 " {(c0 ` c1)}), (`' c0 " c2), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  sylbi((c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, (`' c0 " {(c0 ` c1)})‚äÜ(`' c0 " c2), {(c0 ` c1)} ‚äÜ c2)
  snss((c0 ` c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  imass2({(c0 ` c1)}, c2, `' c0)
  adantr(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà c2))
  ex(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  fvimacnvi(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: funimass3
blocks.content: A kind of contraposition law that infers an image subclass from a subclass of a preimage. Raph Levien remarks: "Likely this could be proved directly, and ~ fvimacnv would be the special case of ` A ` being a singleton, but it works this way round too." (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm funimass3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
} = {
  syl6bbr(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  bitrd(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  funimass4(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  ralbidva(hs0, c1, wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  imp31(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  syl9r(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  ssel(c1, cdm(c0), cv(hs0))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  fvimacnv(c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  dfss3(hs0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funimass3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0))‚Üí((c0 " c1)‚äÜ c2 ‚Üî c1 ‚äÜ(`' c0 " c2)))
} = {
  syl6bbr((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)), (c0 " c1)‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚äÜ(`' c0 " c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  bitrd((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)), (c0 " c1)‚äÜ c2, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2))
  funimass4(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  ralbidva(hs0, c1, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))
  imp31(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, ((c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  syl9r(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, ((c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0))
  ssel(c1, dom(c0), hs0)
  ex(Fun(c0), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0), ((c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  fvimacnv(c0, hs0, c2)
  dfss3(hs0, c1, (`' c0 " c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c((`' c0 " c2))
}

blocks.name: funimass5
blocks.content: A subclass of a preimage in terms of function values. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2007.)

blocks.name: funconstss
blocks.content: Two ways of specifying that a function is constant on a subdomain. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm funconstss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))), wss(cima(c0, c1), csn(c2)))
  syl6rbb(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wss(cima(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2))))
  funimass4(s0, c0, c1, csn(c2))
  ralbii(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  elsn(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)
  fvex(c0, cv(s0))
  funimass3(c0, c1, csn(c2))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funconstss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0))‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)= c2)‚Üî c1 ‚äÜ(`' c0 " { c2 })))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)= c2), c1 ‚äÜ(`' c0 " { c2 }), (c0 " c1)‚äÜ { c2 })
  syl6rbb((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)= c2), (c0 " c1)‚äÜ { c2 }, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà { c2 }))
  funimass4(s0, c0, c1, { c2 })
  ralbii(s0, c1, (c0 ` s0)‚àà { c2 }, (c0 ` s0)= c2)
  elsn((c0 ` s0), c2)
  fvex(c0, s0)
  funimass3(c0, c1, { c2 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: fvimacnvALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ fvimacnv , based on ~ funimass3 . If ~ funimass3 is ever proved directly, as opposed to using ~ funimacnv pointwise, then the proof of ~ funimacnv should be replaced with this one. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvimacnvALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  sylan2(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wss(csn(c1), cdm(c0)))
  snssi(c1, cdm(c0))
  funimass3(c0, csn(c1), c2)
  syl5bb(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2))
  snss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  sseq1d(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2, cima(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  sylan(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  mpan2(wfun(c0), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c0)))
  eqid(cdm(c0))
  biimpri(wa(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c0))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  df-fn(c0, cdm(c0))
  fnsnfv(c0, cdm(c0), c1)
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(csn(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  snssg(c1, cdm(c0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvimacnvALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0))‚Üí((c0 ` c1)‚àà c2 ‚Üî c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4d((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2), (c0 " { c1 })‚äÜ c2, { c1 } ‚äÜ(`' c0 " c2))
  sylan2(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), ((c0 " { c1 })‚äÜ c2 ‚Üî { c1 } ‚äÜ(`' c0 " c2)), { c1 } ‚äÜ dom(c0))
  snssi(c1, dom(c0))
  funimass3(c0, { c1 }, c2)
  syl5bb((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, (c0 " { c1 })‚äÜ c2, {(c0 ` c1)} ‚äÜ c2)
  snss((c0 ` c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  sseq1d({(c0 ` c1)}, c2, (c0 " { c1 }), (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)))
  sylan(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), {(c0 ` c1)} =(c0 " { c1 }), c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  mpan2(Fun(c0), c0[Fn]dom(c0), dom(c0)= dom(c0))
  eqid(dom(c0))
  biimpri((Fun(c0)‚àß dom(c0)= dom(c0)), c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  df-fn(c0, dom(c0))
  fnsnfv(c0, dom(c0), c1)
  adantl(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c1 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)‚Üî { c1 } ‚äÜ(`' c0 " c2)))
  snssg(c1, dom(c0), (`' c0 " c2))
}

blocks.name: elpreima
blocks.content: Membership in the preimage of a set under a function. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpreima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))))
} = {
  impbid(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3)))
  jcad(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))
  syl5ib(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)))
  sseli(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3), cdm(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, c3)
  eleq2d(c2, cdm(c0), c1, wfn(c0, c1))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  ex(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))
  sylan(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  fvimacnvi(c0, c2, c3)
  expimpd(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)))
  biimpd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)))
  funfni(c0, c1, c2, wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3))))

thm iinpreima(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚Üí(`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))= ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)), ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)), (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  impbida((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)))

  syl21anc(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)), Fun(c0), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2))
  simpll(Fun(c0), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)))
  adantl((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0))
  sseli(hs0, (`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)), dom(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  sylancr(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ùïå, (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  adantlr(Fun(c0), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  fvimacnvi(c0, hs0, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  biimpa((c0 ` hs0)‚àà ùïå, (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2))
  biimpa((Fun(c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà dom(c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, (Fun(c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))
  fvimacnv(c0, hs0, c2)
  mpbid(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2))), hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  sylibr(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2))), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2))
  sylc(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c2), Fun(c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  adantl((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  elv(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))))
  biimpd(hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))

  simpll(Fun(c0), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)))
  imp((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0))
  adantl(Fun(c0), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2))‚Üí hs0 ‚àà dom(c0)))
  syl5bi(c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  elv(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2))‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))))
  eliin(s0, hs0, universe, c1, (`' c0 " c2))
  syl6(c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2)))
  biimpi(c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))))
  r19.2zb(s0, c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2))
  rexlimivw(s0, c1, hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " c2), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0))

blocks.name: fimacnv
blocks.content: The preimage of the codomain of a mapping is the mapping's domain. (Contributed by FL, 25-Jan-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), c1))
} = {
  eqssd(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), c1, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  syl5ss(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), c1, crn(ccnv(c0)), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  imassrn(ccnv(c0), c2)
  syl5eqssr(crn(ccnv(c0)), c1, cdm(c0), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  dfdm4(c0)
  syl6eqss(cdm(c0), c1, c1, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  mpbid(wf(c0, c1, c2), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))
  fimass(c0, c1, c2, c1)
  syl2anc(wf(c0, c1, c2), wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  ffun(c0, c1, c2)
  syl5sseqr(c1, cdm(c0), c1, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  ssid(c1)
  fdm(c0, c1, c2)
  funimass3(c0, c1, c2)
}

thm fimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚Üí(`' c0 " c2)= c1)
} = {
  eqssd((`' c0 " c2), c1, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))

  imassrn(`' c0, c2)
  syl5eqssr(ran(`' c0), c1, dom(c0), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))

  mpbid((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), c1 ‚äÜ(`' c0 " c2), (c0 " c1)‚äÜ c2)
  fimass(c0, c1, c2, c1)

  ffun(c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: fimacnvinrn
blocks.content: Taking the converse image of a set can be limited to the range of the function used. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)

thm fimacnvinrn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c1, crn(c0)))))
} = {
  3eqtrrd(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c1, crn(c0))), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), crn(c0))), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c0)), wfun(c0))
  inpreima(c0, c1, crn(c0))
  ineq2d(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), crn(c0)), cdm(c0), wfun(c0))
  syl(wfun(c0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), crn(c0)), cdm(c0)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  sylbi(wfun(c0), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wfo(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  funforn(c0)
  fof(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  fimacnv(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  syl5eqr(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c0)), cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(cres(c0, cdm(c0))), c1), wfun(c0))
  cnvresima(c0, cdm(c0), c1)
  imaeq1d(ccnv(cres(c0, cdm(c0))), c1, ccnv(c0), wfun(c0))
  cnveqd(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), c0, wfun(c0))
  syl5eq(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)), wfun(c0))
  resdm2(c0)
  sylib(wfun(c0), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  funrel(c0)
  dfrel2(c0)
}

} = {

blocks.name: fimacnvinrn2
blocks.content: Taking the converse image of a set can be limited to the range of the function used. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimacnvinrn2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, c1)), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(cin(c2, c1), crn(c0))), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, crn(c0))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c0), cin(cin(c2, c1), crn(c0)), cin(c2, crn(c0)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)))
  syl5eq(cin(cin(c2, c1), crn(c0)), cin(c2, crn(c0)), cin(c2, cin(c1, crn(c0))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)))
  inass(c2, c1, crn(c0))
  ineq2d(c2, cin(c1, crn(c0)), crn(c0), wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(cin(c1, crn(c0)), crn(c0)))
  biimpi(wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(cin(c1, crn(c0)), crn(c0)))
  sseqin2(crn(c0), c1)
  adantr(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, c1)), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(cin(c2, c1), crn(c0)))))
  fimacnvinrn(c0, cin(c2, c1))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, crn(c0)))))
  fimacnvinrn(c0, c2)
}

thm fimacnvinrn2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß ran(c0)‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(`' c0 " c2)=(`' c0 "(c2 ‚ãÇ c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd((`' c0 " c2), (`' c0 "(c2 ‚ãÇ c1)), (`' c0 "((c2 ‚ãÇ c1)‚ãÇ ran(c0))), (`' c0 "(c2 ‚ãÇ ran(c0))), (Fun(c0)‚àß ran(c0)‚äÜ c1))

  ineq2d(c2, (c1 ‚ãÇ ran(c0)), ran(c0), (Fun(c0)‚àß ran(c0)‚äÜ c1))

  biimpi(ran(c0)‚äÜ c1, (c1 ‚ãÇ ran(c0))= ran(c0))

  adantr(Fun(c0), ran(c0)‚äÜ c1, (`' c0 "(c2 ‚ãÇ c1))=(`' c0 "((c2 ‚ãÇ c1)‚ãÇ ran(c0))))

blocks.name: nelrnfvne

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylibd(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, crn(c0)), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(hs0, crn(c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs0))))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, crn(c0)), wrex(hs0, crn(c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs0))))
  syl(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, crn(c0))), wrex(hs0, crn(c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c1, crn(c0)), wceq(c1, c1)))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, crn(c0)), wa(wcel(c1, crn(c0)), wceq(c1, c1)))
  ancli(wcel(c1, crn(c0)), wceq(c1, c1))
  eqidd(c1, wcel(c1, crn(c0)))
  rspcev(hs0, c1, crn(c0), wceq(c1, c1), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c1, c1)
  sylbi(wfun(c0), wb(wrex(hs0, crn(c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  funfn(c0)
  rexrn(hs0, s0, c0, cdm(c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c1, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))

blocks.name: eldmrexrnb
blocks.content: For any element in the domain of a function, there is an element in the range of the function which is the value of the function at that element. Because of the definition ~ df-fv of the value of a function, the theorem is only valid in general if the empty set is not contained in the range of the function (the implication "to the right" is always valid). Indeed, with the definition ~ df-fv of the value of a function, ` ( F `` Y ) = (/) ` may mean that the value of ` F ` at ` Y ` is the empty set or that ` F ` is not defined at ` Y ` . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm eldmrexrnb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0))), wb(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wrex(s0, crn(c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

thm eldmrexrnb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0))‚Üí(c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), s0 =(c0 ` c1))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid((Fun(c0)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0)), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), s0 =(c0 ` c1)))
  adantr(Fun(c0), ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0), (c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), s0 =(c0 ` c1))))
  eldmrexrn(s0, c0, c1)
  rexlimdv(s0, ran(c0), (Fun(c0)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0)), s0 =(c0 ` c1), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  com13((Fun(c0)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0)), s0 ‚àà ran(c0), s0 =(c0 ` c1), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  syl6bi(s0 =(c0 ` c1), s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ((Fun(c0)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 ` c1)‚àà ran(c0))
  eleq1(s0, (c0 ` c1), ran(c0))
  com12((c0 ` c1)‚àà ran(c0), (Fun(c0)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0)), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  adantl(Fun(c0), ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0), ((c0 ` c1)‚àà ran(c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà dom(c0)))
  expcom(‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0), (c0 ` c1)‚àà ran(c0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  syl(((c0 ` c1)‚àà ran(c0)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0)), c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c0 ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  elnelne2((c0 ` c1), ran(c0), emptycls)
  sylbi((c0 ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0 ` c1)))
  n0(hs0, (c0 ` c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0 ` c1), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  elfvdm(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, Fun(c0), ‚àÖ ‚àâ ran(c0))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wnel.s(s0, emptycls, ran(c0))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
}

blocks.name: fvcofneq
blocks.content: The values of two function compositions are equal if the values of the composed functions are pairwise equal. (Contributed by AV, 26-Jan-2019.)

thm ralrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wral(s1, crn(c3), w0), wral(s0, c0, w1)))

} = {
  bitrd(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wral(s1, crn(c3), w0), wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), w0)))
  3bitr3g(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wral(s1, crn(c3), w0), wral(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), w0)), wral(hs0, crn(c3), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)), wral(hs1, c0, wsbc(s1, cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), w0)))

  fnmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)

  fveq2(cv(hs1), cv(s0), c3)
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wral(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), w0)), wral(s0, c0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wb(wsbc(s1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), w0), w1)))
  ralimiaa(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wb(wsbc(s1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), w0), w1))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wsbc(s1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), w0), w1, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))
  sbceq1d(s1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2)), w0)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wsbc(s1, c1, w0), w1))
  sbcieg(s1, c1, c2, w0, w1)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

thm ralrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c3), w0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  bitrd(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c3), w0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,[(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0))
  3bitr3g(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c3), w0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,[(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ran(c3),[hs0 / s1]w0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,[(c3 ` hs1)/ s1]w0))
  syl(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2), (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ran(c3),[hs0 / s1]w0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,[(c3 ` hs1)/ s1]w0)), c3[Fn]c0)
  fnmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ralrn(hs0, hs1, c3, c0, [hs0 / s1]w0, [(c3 ` hs1)/ s1]w0)
  dfsbcq(s1, hs0, (c3 ` hs1), w0)
  bicomi(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ran(c3),[hs0 / s1]w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c3), w0))
  cbvral(s1, hs0, ran(c3), w0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfsbc1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  sbceq1a(s1, hs0, w0)
  cbvral(hs1, s0, c0, [(c3 ` hs1)/ s1]w0, [(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0)
  nfsbc(s0, s1, (c3 ` hs1), w0)
  nffv(s0, c3, hs1)
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, hs1)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfv(hs1, [(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0)
  sbceq1d(s1, (c3 ` hs1), (c3 ` s0), hs1 = s0, w0)
  fveq2(hs1, s0, c3)
  syl(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,[(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,([(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0 ‚Üî w1)))
  ralimiaa(s0, c0, c1 ‚àà c2, ([(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0 ‚Üî w1))
  bitrd((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), [(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0, w1, [c1 / s1]w0)
  sbceq1d(s1, (c3 ` s0), c1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), w0)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantl(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2, ([c1 / s1]w0 ‚Üî w1))
  sbcieg(s1, c1, c2, w0, w1)
  ralbi(s0, c0, [(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0, w1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w([(c3 ` hs1)/ s1]w0)
  diff.hs1.w([hs0 / s1]w0)

thm rexrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wrex(s1, crn(c3), w0), wrex(s0, c0, w1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s1, crn(c3), w0), wrex(s0, c0, w1), wn(wral(s1, crn(c3), wn(w0))), wn(wral(s0, c0, wn(w1))))
  notbid(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wral(s1, crn(c3), wn(w0)), wral(s0, c0, wn(w1)))
  ralrnmpt(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0, w1)
  dfrex2(s1, crn(c3), w0)
  dfrex2(s0, c0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w1)
}
