thm rexrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ran(c3), w0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ran(c3), w0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c3), ¬¨ w0), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ w1))
  notbid(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c3), ¬¨ w0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ w1))
  ralrnmpt(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ¬¨ w0, ¬¨ w1)
  notbid(s1 = c1, w0, w1)
  dfrex2(s1, ran(c3), w0)

  diff.wn.s(s0, w0)

thm dff2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  jca(wf(c0, c1, c2), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))

  syl(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  sylibr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c0))
  syl2an2r(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c0), wfun(c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)))
  biimpar(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cdm(c0), c1, wf(c0, c1, c2))

  fvex(c0, cv(s0))

thm dff4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c2, s0[c0]s1))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c2, s0[c0]s1))), (c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ!(s1, s0[c0]s1))))
  dff3(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ!(s1, s0[c0]s1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c2, s0[c0]s1)))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2), ‚àÉ!(s1, s0[c0]s1), ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c2, s0[c0]s1))
  syl6bbr(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2), ‚àÉ!(s1, s0[c0]s1), ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c2, s0[c0]s1), ‚àÉ!(s1,(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0[c0]s1)))
  eubidv(s1, c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2), s0[c0]s1, (s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0[c0]s1))
  pm4.71rd(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2), s0[c0]s1, s1 ‚àà c2)
  syl5bi(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2), s0[c0]s1, s1 ‚àà c2, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c0)
  df-br(s0, c0, s1)
  syl6(c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2), < s0, s1 > ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c2, < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c2))
  ssel(c0, (c1 √ó c2), < s0, s1 >)
  opelxp2(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  df-reu(s1, c2, s0[c0]s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, (c1 √ó c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, (c1 √ó c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: dffo3
blocks.content: An onto mapping expressed in terms of function values. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2006.)

thm dffo3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)))
  dffo2(c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  bitrd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wceq(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), c2))
  syl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wb(wceq(crn(c0), c2), wceq(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), c2)), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeq1d(crn(c0), c2, cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  fnrnfv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3bitr4g(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wal(s0, wb(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  albidv(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wb(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  syl6rbbr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wb(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wi(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  biantrurd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wi(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  rexlimdva2(s1, c1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  simpr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  adantr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2))
  ffvelrn(c0, c1, c2, cv(s1))
  dfbi2(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  abeq1(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  df-ral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm dffo3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚Üî((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ran(c0)= c2))
  dffo2(c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ran(c0)= c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))))
  bitrd((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ran(c0)= c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))), { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))} = c2)
  syl((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (ran(c0)= c2 ‚Üî { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))} = c2), c0[Fn]c1)
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeq1d(ran(c0), c2, { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))}, c0[Fn]c1)
  fnrnfv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3bitr4g((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))} = c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))), ‚àÄ(s0,(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üî s0 ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))))
  albidv(s0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üî s0 ‚àà c2), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))))
  syl6rbbr((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üî s0 ‚àà c2), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))), ((‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üí s0 ‚àà c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))))
  biantrurd((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))), (‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üí s0 ‚àà c2))
  rexlimdva2(s1, c1, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), s0 =(c0 ` s1), s0 ‚àà c2)
  eqeltrd(s0, c2, (c0 ` s1), (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚àß s0 =(c0 ` s1)))
  simpr(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  adantr(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), s0 =(c0 ` s1), (c0 ` s1)‚àà c2)
  ffvelrn(c0, c1, c2, s1)
  dfbi2(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), s0 ‚àà c2)
  abeq1(s0, c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))
  df-ral(s0, c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm dffo4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  impbii(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  sylbi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)))
  dffo2(c0, c1, c2)
  jca(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)), wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  simpl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  mpd(wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  adantll(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  biimpar(wceq(crn(c0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  syl5bbr(wceq(crn(c0), c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  elrn(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  eleq2(crn(c0), c2, cv(s0))
  ad2antrr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wi(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  syl6ibr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  eximdv(s1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  ancrd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  syl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wfn(c0, c1))
  ex(wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  fnbr(c0, c1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-rex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  sylibr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  imdistani(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  ralimdv(s0, c2, wf(c0, c1, c2), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  reximdva(s1, c1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  sylan(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6ib(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  biimprd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  fnbrfvb(c0, c1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  eqcom(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  dffo3(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, crn(c0), c2)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm dffo4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚Üî((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  impbii((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0))))
  sylbi((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0))), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ran(c0)= c2))
  dffo2(c0, c1, c2)
  jca(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ran(c0)= c2), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0)))
  simpl((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ran(c0)= c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ran(c0)= c2), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0))
  mpd((((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ran(c0)= c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  adantll((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ran(c0)= c2, s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  biimpar(ran(c0)= c2, s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  syl5bbr(ran(c0)= c2, ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0), s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà ran(c0))
  elrn(s1, s0, c0)
  vex(s0)
  eleq2(ran(c0), c2, s0)
  ad2antrr((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ran(c0)= c2, s0 ‚àà c2, (‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0)))
  syl6ibr((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1[c0]s0)))
  eximdv(s1, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), s1[c0]s0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1[c0]s0))
  ancrd((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), s1[c0]s0, s1 ‚àà c1)
  syl((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (s1[c0]s0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà c1), c0[Fn]c1)
  ex(c0[Fn]c1, s1[c0]s0, s1 ‚àà c1)
  fnbr(c0, c1, s1, s0)
  df-rex(s1, c1, s1[c0]s0)
  sylibr(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0))), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))))
  imdistani((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))))
  ralimdv(s0, c2, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))
  reximdva(s1, c1, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), s1[c0]s0, s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  sylan((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), s1 ‚àà c1, (s1[c0]s0 ‚Üí s0 =(c0 ` s1)), c0[Fn]c1)
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6ib((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), s1[c0]s0, s0 =(c0 ` s1), (c0 ` s1)= s0)
  biimprd((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), s1[c0]s0, (c0 ` s1)= s0)
  fnbrfvb(c0, c1, s1, s0)
  eqcom((c0 ` s1), s0)
  dffo3(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ran(c0)= c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, ran(c0), c2)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: dffo5
blocks.content: Alternate definition of an onto mapping. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffo5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  dffo4(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  impbii(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  anim2i(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  ralimi(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  rexex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  imdistani(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  ralimdv(s0, c2, wf(c0, c1, c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  syl6ibr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  eximdv(s1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  ancrd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  syl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  ex(wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  fnbr(c0, c1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-rex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm dffo5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚Üî((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0))), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0))))

  anim2i((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0)))
  ralimi(s0, c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  rexex(s1, c1, s1[c0]s0)
  imdistani((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0)))
  ralimdv(s0, c2, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0))
  syl6ibr((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÉ(s1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1[c0]s0)))
  eximdv(s1, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), s1[c0]s0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1[c0]s0))
  ancrd((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), s1[c0]s0, s1 ‚àà c1)
  syl((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (s1[c0]s0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà c1), c0[Fn]c1)
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  ex(c0[Fn]c1, s1[c0]s0, s1 ‚àà c1)
  fnbr(c0, c1, s1, s0)
  df-rex(s1, c1, s1[c0]s0)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: exfo
blocks.content: A relation equivalent to the existence of an onto mapping. The right-hand ` f ` is not necessarily a function. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm exfo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wex(s0, wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  eximi(s0, wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1), wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  sylbi(wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1), wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  dffo4(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  anim1i(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  simprbi(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wss(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)))
  dff4(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  sylib(wex(s0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  exlimiv(s0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  syl(wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wfo(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1))
  sylibr(wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wfo(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1), wa(wf(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1), wceq(crn(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))), c1)))
  anim12i(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wf(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1), wceq(crn(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))), c1))
  sylibr(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wf(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1), wa(wss(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), cv(s2))))))
  jctil(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), cv(s2)))))
  ralimia(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2))), wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), cv(s2))))
  biimpd(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2))), wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), cv(s2))))
  reubidva(s2, c1, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), cv(s2)))
  brinxp(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2), c1, cv(s0))
  inss2(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  dff4(s1, s2, cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1)
  biimpri(wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(crn(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))), c1))
  rninxp(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  dffo2(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1)
  spcev(hs0, cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wfo(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1), wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  inex1(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  vex(s0)
  foeq1(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1)
  cbvexvw(hs0, s0, wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1))
  foeq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, c1)
  diff.wex.s(s0, hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cin.s(s2, cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wfo(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1))
  diff.wfo.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm exfo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0,(s0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  impbii(‚àÉ(s0,(s0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1)), ‚àÉ(s0,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1)))))
  eximi(s0, (s0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1), (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1))))
  sylbi((s0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1), (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1))), ((s0 : c0 ‚Üí c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1))))
  dffo4(s1, s2, s0, c0, c1)
  anim1i((s0 : c0 ‚Üí c1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2)))
  simprbi((s0 : c0 ‚Üí c1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2)), s0 ‚äÜ(c0 √ó c1))
  dff4(s1, s2, s0, c0, c1)
  sylib(‚àÉ(s0,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1)))), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1)), ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1)))
  exlimiv(s0, (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1))), ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1)))
  syl((‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1))), ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1)), ((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)): c0 ‚Ü† c1))
  sylibr((‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1))), ((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)): c0 ‚Ü† c1), (((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)): c0 ‚Üí c1)‚àß ran((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)))= c1))
  anim12i(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1)), ((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)): c0 ‚Üí c1), ran((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)))= c1)
  sylibr(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2)), ((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)): c0 ‚Üí c1), ((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1))‚äÜ(c0 √ó c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[(s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1))]s2))))
  jctil(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2)), (s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1))‚äÜ(c0 √ó c1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[(s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1))]s2)))
  ralimia(s1, c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2), ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[(s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1))]s2))
  biimpd(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[s0]s2), ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, s1[(s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1))]s2))
  reubidva(s2, c1, s1 ‚àà c0, s1[s0]s2, s1[(s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1))]s2)
  brinxp(s1, c0, s2, c1, s0)
  inss2(s0, (c0 √ó c1))
  dff4(s1, s2, (s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)), c0, c1)
  biimpri(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0, s2[s0]s1)), ran((s0 ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c1)))= c1)

blocks.name: foelrn
blocks.content: Property of a surjective function. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 4-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm foelrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylan(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  simprbi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  dffo3(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  impl(wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  syl5(wf(c3, c4, c1), wa(wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs2, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)))))

  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, cv(hs2))
  fvco3(c3, c4, c1, cv(hs2), c0)
  rspceeqv(hs1, cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), c1, cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs2))), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), c0)
  rexbidv(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))
  3anass(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2))

  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß((c0 ‚àò c3): c4 ‚Ü† c2))‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2))

  anim2i((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß((c0 ‚àò c3): c4 ‚Ü† c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1))))

  impl((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), ((c0 ‚àò c3): c4 ‚Ü† c2), hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)))
  syl5((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (((c0 ‚àò c3): c4 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà c4, hs0 =((c0 ‚àò c3)` hs2)))

thm fmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

} = {

  r19.29(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))

  df-f(c3, c0, c2)

  syl5reqr(c0, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), cima(ccnv(c3), c2), wf(c3, c0, c2))

} = {
  impbida(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wf(c3, c2, c1), wf(c3, c2, c0))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wf(c3, c2, c1)), wf(c3, c2, c0), wa(wfn(c3, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))))
  anim12ci(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wf(c3, c2, c1), wfn(c3, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)))
  simpr(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)))
  ffn(c3, c2, c1)

  syl(wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wf(c3, c2, c0)), wf(c3, c2, c1), wa(wf(c3, c2, c0), wss(c0, c1)))
  anim1ci(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wf(c3, c2, c0), wss(c0, c1))

thm fmpt2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2)))
  mpbird(w0, wfn(c0, c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c1))
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, c4)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  fnmpt(s0, c1, c3, c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c3))
  fneq1d(c0, c1, cmpt(s0, c1, c3), w0)
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2))
  ffnfv(s1, c0, c1, c2)
}

  ralimia(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), c2))

thm f1oresrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(cres(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s1, c2, w2)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wf1o(cres(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s1, c2, w2)), wf1o(cres(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s1, c2, w2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wf1o(cres(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s1, c2, w2)), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wf1o(cres(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2)), crab(s1, c2, w2), crab(s0, c1, w1)))
  3syl(w0, wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wfun(c0))
  f1ofun(c0, c1, c2)
  funcnvcnv(c0)
  mpbid(w0, wf1o(cres(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2)), crab(s1, c2, w2), crab(s0, c1, w1)), wf1o(cres(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2)), crab(s1, c2, w2), cima(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2))))
  sylancl(w0, wf1o(cres(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2)), crab(s1, c2, w2), cima(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2))), wf1(ccnv(c0), c2, c1), wss(crab(s1, c2, w2), c2))
  3syl(w0, wf1(ccnv(c0), c2, c1), wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(ccnv(c0), c2, c1))
  f1ocnv(c0, c1, c2)
  f1of1(ccnv(c0), c2, c1)
  ssrab2(s1, c2, w2)
  f1ores(ccnv(c0), c2, c1, crab(s1, c2, w2))
  f1oeq3d(cres(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2)), crab(s1, c2, w2), cima(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2)), crab(s0, c1, w1), w0)
  syl5eq(cima(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2)), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c3, crab(s1, c2, w2))), w0)
  mptpreima(s0, c0, crab(s1, c2, w2), c1, c3)
  rabbidva(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c3, crab(s1, c2, w2)), w1)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wcel(c3, crab(s1, c2, w2)), w1), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), c3), wb(w2, w1))), wcel(c3, c2))
  alrimiv(s1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), c3), wb(w2, w1)))
  3expia(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3), wb(w2, w1))
  r19.21bi(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c3, c2))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, c2)), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  syl(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c1, c2))
  f1of(c0, c1, c2)
  fmpt(s0, c1, c3, c2, c0)
  elrab3t(s1, c3, c2, w2, w1)
  f1orescnv(ccnv(c0), crab(s1, c2, w2), crab(s0, c1, w1))
  ax-mp(wb(wf1o(cres(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s1, c2, w2)), wf1o(cres(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s1, c2, w2))), wceq(cres(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w1)), cres(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))))
  rescnvcnv(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))
  f1oeq1(cres(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), crab(s0, c1, w1)), cres(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s1, c2, w2))
  diff.crab.s(s0, s1, c2, w2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)

blocks.name: fmptco

F ) ` has the equation ` ( 3 * ( x + 2 ) ) ` . (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)

thm fmptcof(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  eqid(c2)

  csbiegf(s1, c4, c5, c6, c3)

thm fmptcof(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s1 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ c6))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)), d(s0, s1))
  eqtrd((c0 ‚àò c1), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶[c4 / s1]c6), w0)
  syl6eqr((c0 ‚àò c1), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶[c4 / s1]c6), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶[[hs0 / s0]c4 / s1]c6), w0)
  fmptco(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, [[hs0 / s0]c4 / s1]c6, [hs0 / s0]c4, c5, [hs1 / s1]c6, w0)
  mpan9(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, [hs0 / s0]c4 ‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5))
  rspc(s0, hs0, c2, c4 ‚àà c5, [hs0 / s0]c4 ‚àà c5)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c4, c5)
  eleq1d(c4, c5, [hs0 / s0]c4, s0 = hs0)
  syl6eq(c1, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶[hs0 / s0]c4), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c4), w0)
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c2, c4, [hs0 / s0]c4)
  nfcv(hs0, c4)
  syl6eq(c0, (hs1 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶[hs1 / s1]c6), (s1 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ c6), w0)
  cbvmpt(s1, hs1, c5, c6, [hs1 / s1]c6)
  nfcv(hs1, c6)
  nfcsb1v(s1, hs1, c6)
  csbeq1a(s1, hs1, c6)
  csbeq1(s1, hs1, [hs0 / s0]c4, c6)
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c2, [c4 / s1]c6, [[hs0 / s0]c4 / s1]c6)
  nfcv(hs0, [c4 / s1]c6)
  nfcsb(s0, s1, [hs0 / s0]c4, c6)

  nfcv(s0, c6)
  csbeq1d(s1, c4, c6, [hs0 / s0]c4, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c4)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶[c4 / s1]c6)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5))
  sylancr(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶[c4 / s1]c6)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3), c2 = c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,[c4 / s1]c6 = c3))
  eqid(c2)
  ralimi(s0, c2, c4 ‚àà c5, [c4 / s1]c6 = c3)
  csbiegf(s1, c4, c5, c6, c3)
  nfcvd(s1, c3, c4 ‚àà c5)
  mpteq12(s0, c2, c2, [c4 / s1]c6, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c([hs1 / s1]c6)
  diff.hs1.c([[hs0 / s0]c4 / s1]c6)
  diff.hs1.c([hs0 / s0]c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

blocks.name: fmptcos
blocks.content: Composition of two functions expressed as mapping abstractions. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fmptcos(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, csb(s1, c3, c4))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c5, c4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, csb(s1, c3, c4)))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  fmptcof(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, csb(s1, c3, c4), c3, c5, csb(s1, cv(hs0), c4), w0)
  syl6eq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c5, csb(s1, cv(hs0), c4)), cmpt(s1, c5, c4), w0)
  cbvmpt(s1, hs0, c5, c4, csb(s1, cv(hs0), c4))
  nfcv(hs0, c4)
  nfcsb1v(s1, cv(hs0), c4)
  csbeq1a(s1, cv(hs0), c4)
  csbeq1(s1, cv(hs0), c3, c4)
  diff.csb.s(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s1, c3, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm fmptcos(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶[c3 / s1]c4))

} = {

  syl6eq(c0, (hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶[hs0 / s1]c4), (s1 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ c4), w0)

blocks.name: cofmpt
blocks.content: Express composition of a maps-to function with another function in a maps-to notation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cofmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, cfv(c0, c2), c2, c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c0, c3, c4, w0)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm cofmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))=(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(c0 ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c3 ‚Üí c4))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), c1, (c0 ` c2), c2, c3, (c0 ` hs0), w0)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

blocks.name: fcompt
blocks.content: Express composition of two functions as a maps-to applying both in sequence. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcompt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c0, c3, c4, cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)))
  adantll(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, cv(s0))
  sylib(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wfn(c3, c4))
  adantl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfn(c3, c4))
  ffn(c3, c4, c1)
  dffn5(s0, c3, c4)
  sylib(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  adantr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  dffn5(hs0, c0, c1)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1))
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c3, c4, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm fcompt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1))‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c3)=(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(c0 `(c3 ` s0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c0, c3, c4, (c0 `(c3 ` s0)), (c3 ` s0), c1, (c0 ` hs0), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)))

thm fsn2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {
  bitri((c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí c2), ((c0 ` c1)‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 = { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> }), ((c0 ` c1)‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí {(c0 ` c1)})))
  impbii((c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí c2), ((c0 ` c1)‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí {(c0 ` c1)})))
  jca((c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí c2), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, (c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí {(c0 ` c1)}))
  mpan2((c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí c2), (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà { c1 })
  ffvelrn(c0, { c1 }, c2, c1)

  biimpi(c0[Fn]{ c1 }, (c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí ran(c0)))
  dffn3(c0, { c1 })
  feq3d(c0, { c1 }, ran(c0), {(c0 ` c1)}, c0[Fn]{ c1 })
  eqtr4d(ran(c0), {(c0 ` c1)}, (c0 " { c1 }), c0[Fn]{ c1 })
  syl5eqr(ran(c0), (c0 " { c1 }), (c0 " dom(c0)), c0[Fn]{ c1 })
  imadmrn(c0)
  imaeq2d(c0, dom(c0), { c1 }, c0[Fn]{ c1 })
  fndm(c0, { c1 })
  mpan2(c0[Fn]{ c1 }, {(c0 ` c1)} =(c0 " { c1 }), c1 ‚àà { c1 })
  snid(c1)

  sylan((c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, (c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí {(c0 ` c1)}), (c0 : { c1 } ‚Üí c2), {(c0 ` c1)} ‚äÜ c2)
  snssi((c0 ` c1), c2)

  fsn(c0, c1, (c0 ` c1))

}

blocks.name: fsng
blocks.content: A function maps a singleton to a singleton iff it is the singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2)))))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wb(wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2)))), wb(wf(c4, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wb(wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wf(c4, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  feq2d(c4, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs1)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqeq2d(c4, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1)))), wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))))
  feq3d(c4, csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1)), csn(c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  sneq(cv(hs1), c2)
  eqeq2d(c4, csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), csn(cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  sneqd(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  fsn(c4, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wb(wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí((c4 : { c0 } ‚Üí { c2 })‚Üî c4 = { < c0, c2 > }))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ((c4 : { c0 } ‚Üí { c2 })‚Üî c4 = { < c0, c2 > }), ((c4 : { hs0 } ‚Üí { hs1 })‚Üî c4 = { < hs0, hs1 > }), ((c4 : { c0 } ‚Üí { hs1 })‚Üî c4 = { < c0, hs1 > }))
  bibi12d(hs0 = c0, (c4 : { hs0 } ‚Üí { hs1 }), c4 = { < hs0, hs1 > }, (c4 : { c0 } ‚Üí { hs1 }), c4 = { < c0, hs1 > })
  feq2d(c4, { hs0 }, { hs1 }, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  sneq(hs0, c0)
  eqeq2d(c4, { < hs0, hs1 > }, { < c0, hs1 > }, hs0 = c0)
  sneqd(< hs0, hs1 >, < c0, hs1 >, hs0 = c0)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  bibi12d(hs1 = c2, (c4 : { c0 } ‚Üí { hs1 }), c4 = { < c0, hs1 > }, (c4 : { c0 } ‚Üí { c2 }), c4 = { < c0, c2 > })
  feq3d(c4, { c0 }, { hs1 }, { c2 }, hs1 = c2)
  sneq(hs1, c2)
  eqeq2d(c4, { < c0, hs1 > }, { < c0, c2 > }, hs1 = c2)
  sneqd(< c0, hs1 >, < c0, c2 >, hs1 = c2)
  opeq2(hs1, c2, c0)
  fsn(c4, hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c4 : { c0 } ‚Üí { hs1 })‚Üî c4 = { < c0, hs1 > }))
  diff.hs1.w(((c4 : { c0 } ‚Üí { c2 })‚Üî c4 = { < c0, c2 > }))
}

blocks.name: fsn2g
blocks.content: A function that maps a singleton to a class is the singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsn2g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wf(c2, csn(c0), c3), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)))))))
} = {
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, wf(c2, csn(c0), c3), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))))), wf(c2, csn(cv(hs0)), c3), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))))
  feq2d(c2, csn(cv(hs0)), c3, csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)))))
  eleq1d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeq2d(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq12d(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  fsn2(c2, cv(hs0), c3)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wf(c2, csn(c0), c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))))))
}

thm fsn2g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí((c2 : { c0 } ‚Üí c3)‚Üî((c2 ` c0)‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 = { < c0,(c2 ` c0)> })))
} = {
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, (c2 : { c0 } ‚Üí c3), ((c2 ` c0)‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 = { < c0,(c2 ` c0)> }), (c2 : { hs0 } ‚Üí c3), ((c2 ` hs0)‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 = { < hs0,(c2 ` hs0)> }))
  feq2d(c2, { hs0 }, c3, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  sneq(hs0, c0)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (c2 ` hs0)‚àà c3, c2 = { < hs0,(c2 ` hs0)> }, (c2 ` c0)‚àà c3, c2 = { < c0,(c2 ` c0)> })
  eleq1d((c2 ` hs0), c3, (c2 ` c0), hs0 = c0)

  sneqd(< hs0,(c2 ` hs0)>, < c0,(c2 ` c0)>, hs0 = c0)
  opeq12d(hs0, (c2 ` hs0), c0, (c2 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)

}

blocks.name: xpsng
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of two singletons is the singleton consisting in the associated ordered pair. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: xpprsng
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of an unordered pair and a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 20-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpprsng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cxp(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c4))))
} = {
  syl5eq(cxp(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c4)), cxp(cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csn(c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  xpeq1i(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4), cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)))
  df-pr(c0, c2)
  3eqtr4g(cxp(cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csn(c4)), cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c4)), cun(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c4)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c4))), cun(csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c4))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  uneq12d(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c4)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c4)), csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c4)), csn(cop(c0, c4))))
  xpsng(c0, c1, c4, c5)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cxp(csn(c2), csn(c4)), csn(cop(c2, c4))))
  xpsng(c2, c3, c4, c5)
  xpundir(csn(c0), csn(c2), csn(c4))
  df-pr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c4))
}

blocks.name: xpsn

blocks.name: f1o2sn
blocks.content: A singleton consisting in a nested ordered pair is a one-to-one function from the cartesian product of two singletons onto a singleton (case where the two singletons are equal). (Contributed by AV, 15-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1o2sn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1o(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(c2)))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1o(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(c2)), wf1o(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c2)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1o(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c0), universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  opex(c0, c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  f1osng(cop(c0, c0), universe, c2, c3)
  f1oeq2d(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c2), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(csn(cop(c0, c0)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0))))
  eqcomd(csn(cop(c0, c0)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  anidms(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))
  xpsng(c0, c1, c0, c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí({ < < c0, c0 >, c2 > } :({ c0 } √ó { c0 })‚Üî { c2 }))
} = {

  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, { < c0, c0 > } =({ c0 } √ó { c0 }))
  eqcomd({ < c0, c0 > }, ({ c0 } √ó { c0 }), c0 ‚àà c1)
  anidms(c0 ‚àà c1, ({ c0 } √ó { c0 })= { < c0, c0 > })

blocks.name: residpr
blocks.content: Restriction of the identity to a pair. (Contributed by AV, 11-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm residpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cres(cid, cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cop(c0, c0), cop(c2, c2))))
} = {
  syl5eq(cres(cid, cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cop(c0, c0), cop(c2, c2)), cun(cres(cid, csn(c0)), cres(cid, csn(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  eqtri(cres(cid, cpr(c0, c2)), cun(cres(cid, csn(c0)), cres(cid, csn(c2))), cres(cid, cun(csn(c0), csn(c2))))
  reseq2i(cid, cpr(c0, c2), cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)))
  df-pr(c0, c2)
  resundi(cid, csn(c0), csn(c2))
  3eqtr4g(cun(cres(cid, csn(c0)), cres(cid, csn(c2))), cpr(cop(c0, c0), cop(c2, c2)), cun(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2))), cun(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(cop(c2, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  uneq12d(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2)), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(cop(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))
  anidms(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))
  xpsng(c0, c1, c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, c2))))
  anidms(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, c2))))
  xpsng(c2, c3, c2, c3)
  uneq12i(cres(cid, csn(c0)), cres(cid, csn(c2)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2)))
  restidsing(c0)
  restidsing(c2)

}

blocks.name: fnasrn
blocks.content: A function expressed as the range of another function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnasrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))), ciun(s0, c0, csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))))
  dfmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  eqtr4i(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))), ciun(s0, c0, csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))))))
  eqtr4i(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), c1)))))
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1)), c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1)))
  abbii(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cv(s0), c1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), c1))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), c1)))
  velsn(hs0, cop(cv(s0), c1))
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, csn(cop(cv(s0), c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cv(s0), c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(cv(s0), c1)))
}

thm fnasrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)= ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, c1 >))
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
} = {
  eqtr4i((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, c1 >)), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, { < s0, c1 > }))
  dfmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  eqtr4i(ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, c1 >)), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, { < s0, c1 > }), { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà { < s0, c1 > })})
  eqtr4i(ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, c1 >)), { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà { < s0, c1 > })}, { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 = < s0, c1 >)})
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, c1 >), c0, < s0, c1 >)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, c1 >))
  abbii(hs0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà { < s0, c1 > }), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 = < s0, c1 >))
  rexbii(s0, c0, hs0 ‚àà { < s0, c1 > }, hs0 = < s0, c1 >)
  velsn(hs0, < s0, c1 >)
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, { < s0, c1 > })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(< s0, c1 >)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ < s0, c1 > })
}

blocks.name: idref
blocks.content: Two ways to state that a relation is reflexive on a class. (Contributed by FL, 15-Jan-2012.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2015.) (Revised by NM, 30-Mar-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm idref(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(cres(cid, c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(wss(cres(cid, c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), c1))
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), c1), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0, c1))
  fmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1, cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  mpbiran(wf(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0, c1), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0))
  fnmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(s0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  df-f(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1))
  df-br(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))
  sseq1i(cres(cid, c0), c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  eqtr3i(cres(cid, c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)))
  mptresid(s0, c0)
  fnasrn(s0, c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
}

thm idref(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((= |` c0)‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4ri((= |` c0)‚äÜ c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0[c1]s0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, < s0, s0 > ‚àà c1), ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >))‚äÜ c1)
  bitri(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, < s0, s0 > ‚àà c1), ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >))‚äÜ c1, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >): c0 ‚Üí c1))
  fmpt(s0, c0, < s0, s0 >, c1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >))
  mpbiran(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >): c0 ‚Üí c1), ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >))‚äÜ c1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >)[Fn]c0)
  fnmpti(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >), c0, < s0, s0 >)
  opex(s0, s0)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >))
  df-f((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >), c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, s0[c1]s0, < s0, s0 > ‚àà c1)
  df-br(s0, c1, s0)
  sseq1i((= |` c0), c1, ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >)))
  eqtr3i((= |` c0), ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ < s0, s0 >)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0))
  mptresid(s0, c0)
  fnasrn(s0, c0, s0)
  vex(s0)
}

blocks.name: funiun
blocks.content: A function is a union of singletons of ordered pairs indexed by its domain. (Contributed by AV, 18-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: funopsn
blocks.content: If a function is an ordered pair then it is a singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 20-Sep-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Jul-2021.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

blocks.content: An ordered pair is a function iff it is a singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 20-Sep-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

thm funop(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wfun(cop(c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wfun(cop(c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))))

  eqid(cop(c0, c1))
  funopsn(s0, cop(c0, c1), c0, c1)
  exlimiv(s0, wa(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))), wfun(cop(c0, c1)))
  adantl(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wfun(cop(c0, c1)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wfun(cop(c0, c1)), wfun(csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  funsn(cv(s0), cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  funeq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, cop(c0, c1))
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: funsneqopb
blocks.content: A singleton of an ordered pair is an ordered pair iff the components are equal. (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
blocks.origin:
thm funsneqopb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, c1)))
} = {
  impbii(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  syl6eqel(c2, cxp(universe, universe), cop(csn(c1), csn(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))

  sneqd(cop(c0, c1), cop(c1, c1), wceq(c0, c1))

  opelvv(csn(c1), csn(c1))

}

  syl((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 |` { c1 })‚äÜ { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> }, (c0 |` { c1 })= { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> })

  syl5bbr(Fun(c0), ¬¨ c1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c0 |` { c1 })= ‚àÖ, (dom(c0)‚ãÇ { c1 })= ‚àÖ)

blocks.name: fvrnressn
blocks.content: If the value of a function is in the range of the function restricted to the singleton containing the argument, then the value of the function is in the range of the function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvrnressn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(cres(c2, csn(c0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(c2))))
} = {
  syl5bir(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(cres(c2, csn(c0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cima(c2, csn(c0))))
  eleq2i(cfv(c2, c0), cima(c2, csn(c0)), crn(cres(c2, csn(c0))))
  df-ima(c2, csn(c0))
  3imtr4d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cima(c2, csn(c0))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(c2)), wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), c2), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), c2)))
  spcegv(hs0, c0, c1, wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), c2))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), c2, cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(c2, c0))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cima(c2, csn(c0))), wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), universe))
  elimasng(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c0), universe, c2)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(c2)), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), c2))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), universe))
  fvex(c2, c0)
  elrn2g(hs0, cfv(c2, c0), universe, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c2, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  elimasng(c0, c1, (c2 ` c0), universe, c2)

blocks.name: fvressn

blocks.name: fvn0fvelrn
blocks.content: If the value of a function is not null, the value is an element of the range of the function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)

  fvfundmfvn0(c0, c1)
  imp(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  mpd(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wi(wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))

  ex(wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))))
  syl(wa(wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))))), wi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  fvelrn(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1)

  sylbid(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  eleq1d(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  fvressn(c1, cdm(c0), c0)
  fvrnressn(c1, cdm(c0), c0)

blocks.name: fvconst

blocks.name: fnsnr
blocks.content: If a class belongs to a function on a singleton, then that class is the obvious ordered pair. Note that this theorem also holds when ` A ` is a proper class, but its meaning is then different. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: fnsnb
blocks.content: A function whose domain is a singleton can be represented as a singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) Revised to add reverse implication. (Revised by NM, 29-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnsnb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  impbii(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))))
  eqrdv(hs0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), wfn(c0, csn(c1)))
  syl6bbr(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))))
  impbid(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))))
  fnsnr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  syl5ibrcom(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0))
  syl(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  sylbi(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wa(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), csn(c1))))
  df-fn(c0, csn(c1))
  anim2i(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), csn(c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cdm(c0), csn(c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  snid(c1)
  eleq2(cdm(c0), csn(c1), c1)
  funfvop(c0, c1)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0)
  velsn(hs0, cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))), wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wfn(csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), csn(c1)))
  fnsn(c1, cfv(c0, c1))
  fvex(c0, c1)
  fneq1(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wfn(c0, csn(c1)))
}

}

  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2)))
  velsn(hs1, cop(c0, c2))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqidd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  eqidd(c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  opelopabga(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c2, c2)))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c2, c2))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c0, c0)))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), c0, c0)
  sylan9bbr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c2, c4))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, c4)
  eqeq2d(c2, c4, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wex(s0, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))))
  elopab(s0, hs0, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))

  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c4, c2))

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs1.s(s0)

thm fmptsng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí { < c0, c2 > } =(s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ c4))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c4 = c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4a({ < c0, c2 > }, (s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ c4), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚àß hs0 = c4)}, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  opabbii(s0, hs0, (s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4), (s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚àß hs0 = c4))
  anbi1i(s0 = c0, hs0 = c4, s0 ‚àà { c0 })
  bicomi(s0 = c0, s0 ‚àà { c0 })
  velsn(s0, c0)
  eqrdv(hs1, { < c0, c2 > }, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)}, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  impbid((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > }, hs1 ‚àà { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)})
  syl5bi((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > }, hs1 ‚àà { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)}, hs1 = < c0, c2 >)
  velsn(hs1, < c0, c2 >)
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), hs1 = < c0, c2 >, hs1 ‚àà { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)}, < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)})
  mpbir2and((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)}, c0 = c0, c2 = c2)
  eqidd(c0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  eqidd(c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  opelopabga(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4), (c0 = c0 ‚àß c2 = c2))
  anbi12d((s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2), s0 = c0, hs0 = c4, c0 = c0, c2 = c2)
  adantr(s0 = c0, hs0 = c2, (s0 = c0 ‚Üî c0 = c0))
  eqeq1(s0, c0, c0)
  sylan9bbr(s0 = c0, hs0 = c2, hs0 = c4, c2 = c2, c2 = c4)
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, c4)
  eqeq2d(c2, c4, c2, s0 = c0)
  eleq1(hs1, < c0, c2 >, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)})
  syl5bi((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), hs1 ‚àà { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)}, hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > }, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)))))
  elopab(s0, hs0, hs1, (s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4))))‚Üí hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > }))
  exlimivv(s0, hs0, (hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4)), hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > })
  impcom(hs1 = < s0, hs0 >, (s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4), hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > })
  sylbid((s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4), hs1 = < s0, hs0 >, hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > }, hs1 = < c0, c4 >)
  eqeq2d(hs1, < s0, hs0 >, < c0, c4 >, (s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4))
  opeq12(s0, c0, hs0, c4)
  syl5ibrcom((s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4), hs1 = < c0, c4 >, hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > }, < c0, c4 > ‚àà { < c0, c2 > })

  opeq2d(c0, c4, c2, (s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c4))
  adantr(s0 = c0, hs0 = c4, c4 = c2)
  snid(< c0, c2 >)
  opex(c0, c2)
  eleq1(hs1, < c0, c4 >, { < c0, c2 > })
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ c4)= { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚àß hs0 = c4)})
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, { c0 }, c4)
  diff.hs1.c({ < c0, c2 > })

  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 = c0, c2 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 = c0 ‚àß c2 = c2))
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, { < c0, c2 > })
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, < c0, c2 >)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c2 > })
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

  sbcbidv(s0, c0, w0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)))

  sbcan(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  anbi12d(w0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wsbc(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))

  syl5ibrcom(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  syl6eqel(cop(c0, c2), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cop(c0, c1), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))

  df-mpt(s0, hs0, csn(c0), c2)
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))

}

thm fmptsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí { < c0, c1 > } =(s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ c2))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí c2 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4a({ < c0, c1 > }, (s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ c2), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚àß hs0 = c2)}, w0)

  velsn(hs1, < c0, c1 >)

  sylibr(w0, < c0, c1 > ‚àà { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)}, [c0 / s0][c1 / hs0](s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2))

  sbcbidv(s0, c0, w0, [c1 / hs0](s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2), (s0 = c0 ‚àß c1 = c2))

  sbcan(hs0, c1, s0 = c0, hs0 = c2)

  eqeq1(s0, c0, c0)

  syl5bi(w0, hs1 ‚àà { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)}, hs1 ‚àà { < c0, c1 > }, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ‚àß(s0 = c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)))))

  snid(< c0, c1 >)
  opex(c0, c1)
  eleq1(hs1, < c0, c2 >, { < c0, c1 > })
  a1i(w0, (s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ c2)= { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚àß hs0 = c2)})
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, { c0 }, c2)

blocks.name: fmptap
blocks.content: Append an additional value to a function. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)

thm fmptap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c4, c1))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wceq(cun(c0, csn(c2)), c4)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  3eqtr2i(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1)), cmpt(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1))
  uneq2i(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1))
  eqtr4i(csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c3))
  mp2an(wceq(csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  fmptsn(s0, c2, universe, c3, universe)
  mpteq2ia(s0, csn(c2), c1, c3)
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  elsni(cv(s0), c2)
  mptun(s0, c0, csn(c2), c1)
  mpteq1i(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1, c4)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c2))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fmptap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚ãÉ { < c2, c3 > })=(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (c0 ‚ãÉ { c2 })= c4
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c2 ‚Üí c1 = c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  3eqtr2i(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚ãÉ { < c2, c3 > }), (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà { c2 } ‚Ü¶ c1)), (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ { c2 })‚Ü¶ c1))
  uneq2i((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), { < c2, c3 > }, (s0 ‚àà { c2 } ‚Ü¶ c1))
  eqtr4i({ < c2, c3 > }, (s0 ‚àà { c2 } ‚Ü¶ c1), (s0 ‚àà { c2 } ‚Ü¶ c3))
  mp2an({ < c2, c3 > } =(s0 ‚àà { c2 } ‚Ü¶ c3), c2 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fmptsn(s0, c2, universe, c3, universe)
  mpteq2ia(s0, { c2 }, c1, c3)
  syl(s0 ‚àà { c2 }, c1 = c3, s0 = c2)
  elsni(s0, c2)
  mptun(s0, c0, { c2 }, c1)
  mpteq1i(s0, (c0 ‚ãÉ { c2 }), c1, c4)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, { c2 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

blocks.content: Append an additional value to a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jan-2017.)

thm fmptapd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c4, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cun(c0, csn(c2)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2d(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1)), cmpt(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1), w0)
  uneq2d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1), w0)
  fmptsnd(s0, c2, c3, c1, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1))))
  mptun(s0, c0, csn(c2), c1)
  mpteq1d(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1, c4, w0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c2))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

thm fmptapd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚ãÉ { < c2, c3 > })=(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà ùïå)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2d(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚ãÉ { < c2, c3 > }), (s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ c1), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà { c2 } ‚Ü¶ c1)), (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ { c2 })‚Ü¶ c1), w0)
  uneq2d((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), { < c2, c3 > }, (s0 ‚àà { c2 } ‚Ü¶ c1), w0)
  fmptsnd(s0, c2, c3, c1, universe, universe, w0)

  mptun(s0, c0, { c2 }, c1)
  mpteq1d(s0, (c0 ‚ãÉ { c2 }), c1, c4, w0)

blocks.name: fmptpr
blocks.content: Express a pair function in maps-to notation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fmptpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, cpr(c0, c2), c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c8))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c4, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(c4, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, cpr(c0, c2), c4), cun(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cun(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c4), csn(cop(c2, c3))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cun(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(cop(c2, c3)))))
  df-pr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3))
  uneq1d(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c4), w0)
  fmptsnd(s0, c0, c1, c4, c5, c7, w0)
  fmptapd(s0, csn(c0), c4, c2, c3, cpr(c0, c2), w0)
  elexd(c2, c6, w0)
  elexd(c3, c8, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), cpr(c0, c2)))
  eqcomi(cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), cpr(c0, c2))
  df-pr(c0, c2)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
}

thm fmptpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí { < c0, c1 >, < c2, c3 > } =(s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 } ‚Ü¶ c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd({ < c0, c1 >, < c2, c3 > }, (s0 ‚àà { c0, c2 } ‚Ü¶ c4), ({ < c0, c1 > } ‚ãÉ { < c2, c3 > }), ((s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ c4)‚ãÉ { < c2, c3 > }), w0)
  a1i(w0, { < c0, c1 >, < c2, c3 > } =({ < c0, c1 > } ‚ãÉ { < c2, c3 > }))
  df-pr(< c0, c1 >, < c2, c3 >)
  uneq1d({ < c0, c1 > }, { < c2, c3 > }, (s0 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ c4), w0)
  fmptsnd(s0, c0, c1, c4, c5, c7, w0)
  fmptapd(s0, { c0 }, c4, c2, c3, { c0, c2 }, w0)

  df-pr(c0, c2)

}

blocks.name: fninfp
blocks.content: Express the class of fixed points of a function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fninfp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(cin(c0, cid)), crab(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

thm fnnfpeq0(class c0, class c1) {

  ralbidva(hs0, c1, wfn(c0, c1), wn(wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0))))

thm fvunsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  syl5eq(cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)), cres(c2, csn(c1)), cun(cres(c2, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1))), wne(c0, c1))
  resundir(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1))
  syl6eq(cun(cres(c2, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1))), cres(c2, csn(c1)), cun(cres(c2, csn(c1)), emptycls), wne(c0, c1))
  uneq2d(cres(c2, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1)), emptycls, wne(c0, c1))
  syl(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cres(csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, csn(c1))))
  nelsn(c0, c1)
  ressnop0(c0, csn(c1), c3)
  un0(cres(c2, csn(c1)))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)), c1), cfv(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvressn(c1, universe, cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)), c1), cfv(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)))
  fvprc(c1, cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cres(c2, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvressn(c1, universe, c2)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cres(c2, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(c2, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cres(c2, csn(c1)))
  fvprc(c1, c2)
}

thm fvsngOLD(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1d(cfv(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq12d(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0), csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0), cv(hs1), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2, wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq1d(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0, csn(cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  sneqd(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fvsn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí({ < c0, c2 > } ` c0)= c2)
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ({ < c0, c2 > } ` c0)= c2, ({ < hs0, hs1 > } ` hs0)= hs1, ({ < c0, hs1 > } ` c0)= hs1)
  eqeq1d(({ < hs0, hs1 > } ` hs0), hs1, ({ < c0, hs1 > } ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq12d({ < hs0, hs1 > }, hs0, { < c0, hs1 > }, c0, hs0 = c0)
  sneqd(< hs0, hs1 >, < c0, hs1 >, hs0 = c0)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  eqeq12d(({ < c0, hs1 > } ` c0), hs1, ({ < c0, c2 > } ` c0), c2, hs1 = c2)
  fveq1d({ < c0, hs1 > }, c0, { < c0, c2 > }, hs1 = c2)
  sneqd(< c0, hs1 >, < c0, c2 >, hs1 = c2)
  opeq2(hs1, c2, c0)
  id(hs1 = c2)
  fvsn(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(({ < c0, hs1 > } ` c0)= hs1)
  diff.hs1.w(({ < c0, c2 > } ` c0)= c2)
}

thm fvsnun1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1)))))
} = {
  3eqtr3a(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1), w0)
  fveq1i(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1, cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)))
  eqtri(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1)))), csn(c1)))
  reseq1i(c0, csn(c1), cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1)))))
  eqtri(cres(cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1)))), csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1))))
  resundir(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1))
  eqtri(cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1))), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  uneq2i(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), emptycls)
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c6, csn(c1)), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  eqtri(cin(cdif(c6, csn(c1)), csn(c1)), emptycls, cin(csn(c1), cdif(c6, csn(c1))))
  incom(cdif(c6, csn(c1)), csn(c1))
  disjdif(csn(c1), c6)
  resdisj(cdif(c6, csn(c1)), csn(c1), c5)
  un0(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)))
  fvresd(c0, csn(c1), c1, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1), c2, cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1), w0)
  fvresd(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1), c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, csn(c1)), wcel(c1, c3))
  snidg(c1, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1), c2), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c4))
  fvsng(c1, c3, c2, c4)
}

thm fvsnun2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(c7, csn(c3))))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1), cfv(cres(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), c1), cfv(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), c1), w0)
  fveq1d(cres(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), c1, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), w0)
  3eqtrd(cres(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cun(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  reseq1i(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3)), cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cun(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))))))
  resundir(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))
  3eqtrd(cun(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cun(emptycls, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cun(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls), w0)
  uneq12d(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), w0)
  mpbii(w0, wceq(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c3), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c3), c7)
  syl(w0, wb(wceq(cin(csn(c3), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls), wceq(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls)), wfn(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3)))
  syl2anc(w0, wfn(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c6))
  fnsng(c3, c4, c5, c6)
  fnresdisj(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  residm(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cun(emptycls, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cun(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls)))
  uncom(emptycls, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cun(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  un0(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))))
  fvresd(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3)), c1, w0)
  fvresd(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)), c1, w0)
}
