  resundir(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1))
  eqtri(cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1))), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  uneq2i(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), emptycls)
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c4, csn(c1)), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  eqtri(cin(cdif(c4, csn(c1)), csn(c1)), emptycls, cin(csn(c1), cdif(c4, csn(c1))))
  incom(cdif(c4, csn(c1)), csn(c1))
  disjdif(csn(c1), c4)
  resdisj(cdif(c4, csn(c1)), csn(c1), c3)
  un0(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  fvres(c1, csn(c1), c0)
  eqtri(cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1), c2, cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1), cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  snid(c1)
  fvres(c1, csn(c1), csn(cop(c1, c2)))

thm fvsnun2OLD(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  uneq12i(cres(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls, cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))))
  mpbi(wceq(cres(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c2), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls))

blocks.name: fnsnsplit
blocks.content: Split a function into a single point and all the rest. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnsnsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, cun(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2))))))
} = {
  eqtr3d(c0, cun(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))), cres(c0, c1), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(cres(c0, c1), c0))
  fnresdm(c0, c1)
  3eqtr3a(cres(c0, c1), cun(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))), cres(c0, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2))), cun(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(c0, csn(c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  resundi(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2))
  reseq2d(c0, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c1, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  adantl(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c1))
  difsnid(c2, c1)
  uneq2d(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(c0, csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  fnressn(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnsnsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c0 =((c0 |`(c1 \ { c2 }))‚ãÉ { < c2,(c0 ` c2)> }))
} = {
  eqtr3d(c0, ((c0 |`(c1 \ { c2 }))‚ãÉ { < c2,(c0 ` c2)> }), (c0 |` c1), (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  adantr(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ‚àà c1, (c0 |` c1)= c0)
  fnresdm(c0, c1)
  3eqtr3a((c0 |` c1), ((c0 |`(c1 \ { c2 }))‚ãÉ { < c2,(c0 ` c2)> }), (c0 |`((c1 \ { c2 })‚ãÉ { c2 })), ((c0 |`(c1 \ { c2 }))‚ãÉ(c0 |` { c2 })), (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  resundi(c0, (c1 \ { c2 }), { c2 })

  fnressn(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: fsnunf
blocks.content: Adjoining a point to a function gives a function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsnunf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), c2))

  mpbid(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), c2), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), cun(c2, csn(c5))))
  syl21anc(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), cun(c2, csn(c5))), wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5)), wceq(cin(c1, csn(c3)), emptycls))
  simp1(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2))
  syl(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5)), wf1o(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf1o(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2))
  simp2l(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c5, c2))
  simp3(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2))
  f1osng(c3, c4, c5, c2)
  f1of(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5))
  sylibr(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(cin(c1, csn(c3)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, c1)))
  simp2r(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c5, c2))
  disjsn(c1, c3)
  fun(c0, c1, c2, csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5))
  feq3d(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), cun(c2, csn(c5)), c2, w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)))
  sylib(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(cun(c2, csn(c5)), c2), wss(csn(c5), c2))
  3ad2ant3(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2), wss(csn(c5), c2))
  snssi(c5, c2)
  ssequn2(csn(c5), c2)
}

thm fsnunf2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c2, c4))), c1, c3))

  feq2d(cun(c0, csn(cop(c2, c4))), cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c3, c1, w3a(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3)))

  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))), wceq(cres(c4, csn(c0)), emptycls), wceq(cdm(cres(c4, csn(c0))), emptycls))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))), wceq(cdm(cres(c4, csn(c0))), emptycls))

  relres(c4, csn(c0))
  reldm0(cres(c4, csn(c0)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))), wceq(cres(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wfn(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))), wfn(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0)))
  fnsng(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  fnresdm(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0))
  resundir(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0))
  eqtr2i(csn(cop(c0, c2)), cun(emptycls, csn(cop(c0, c2))), cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  uncom(emptycls, csn(cop(c0, c2)))
  un0(csn(cop(c0, c2)))
  fvresd(cun(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))), csn(c0), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))

blocks.name: fsnunres
blocks.content: Recover the original function from a point-added function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: funresdfunsn
blocks.content: Restricting a function to a domain without one element of the domain of the function, and adding a pair of this element and the function value of the element results in the function itself. (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: fvpr1
blocks.content: The value of a function with a domain of two elements. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 20-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvpr1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c1, c3)), c0), c2))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {

blocks.name: fntpb
blocks.content: A function whose domain has at most three elements can be represented as a set of at most three ordered pairs. (Contributed by AV, 26-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:

thm fconstfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))))
  ffnfv(s0, c0, c1, csn(c2))
  anbi2i(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  ralbii(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  elsn(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)
  fvex(c0, cv(s0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: resfunexg

  adantr(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2), wfun(cres(c0, c1)))
  funres(c0, c1)
  dffn5(hs0, cres(c0, c1), cdm(cres(c0, c1)))
  fnasrn(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))

  imaeq2i(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))), cdm(cres(c0, c1)))
  dmmpti(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))
  opex(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))))

  funmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))

  dmresexg(c1, c2, c0)

blocks.name: resiexd
blocks.content: The restriction of the identity relation to a set is a set. (Contributed by AV, 15-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: fnex
blocks.content: If the domain of a function is a set, the function is a set. Theorem 6.16(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 28. This theorem is derived using the Axiom of Replacement in the form of ~ resfunexg . See ~ fnexALT for alternate proof. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnex(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
} = {
  syl2an2r(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wrel(c0), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe))
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  sylanb(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe), wa(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1)))
  df-fn(c0, c1)
  anassrs(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe))
  sylan2(wfun(c0), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(cdm(c0), c2))
  impcom(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cdm(c0), c2))
  eleq1a(c1, c2, cdm(c0))
  resfunexg(c0, cdm(c0), c2)
  biimpa(wrel(c0), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  eleq1d(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe, c0, wrel(c0))
  resdm(c0)
}

  anassrs(Fun(c0), dom(c0)= c1, c1 ‚àà c2, (c0 |` dom(c0))‚àà ùïå)
  sylan2(Fun(c0), (dom(c0)= c1 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c0 |` dom(c0))‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà c2)
  impcom(dom(c0)= c1, c1 ‚àà c2, dom(c0)‚àà c2)
  eleq1a(c1, c2, dom(c0))
  resfunexg(c0, dom(c0), c2)
  biimpa(Rel(c0), (c0 |` dom(c0))‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  eleq1d((c0 |` dom(c0)), universe, c0, Rel(c0))
  resdm(c0)
}

blocks.name: funex
blocks.content: If the domain of a function exists, so does the function. Part of Theorem 4.15(v) of [Monk1] p. 46. This theorem is derived using the Axiom of Replacement in the form of ~ fnex . (Note: Any resemblance between F.U.N.E.X. and "Have You Any Eggs" is purely a coincidence originated by Swedish chefs.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.)

blocks.name: opabex
blocks.content: Existence of a function expressed as class of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jul-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wcel(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), universe)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wmo(s1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mp2an(wcel(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), universe), wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wcel(cdm(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), universe))
  mpgbir(s0, wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  funopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  mpbir(wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wmo(s1, w0)))
  moanimv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  ssexi(cdm(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), c0)
  dmopabss(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  funex(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opabex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)} ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ*(s1, w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mp2an({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)} ‚àà ùïå, Fun({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}), dom({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)})‚àà ùïå)
  mpgbir(s0, Fun({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}), ‚àÉ*(s1,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))
  funopab(s0, s1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))
  mpbir(‚àÉ*(s1,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ*(s1, w0)))
  moanimv(s1, s0 ‚àà c0, w0)
  ssexi(dom({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}), c0)
  dmopabss(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  funex({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}, universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: mptexgf
blocks.content: If the domain of a function given by maps-to notation is a set, the function is a set. (Contributed by FL, 6-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)

thm mptexgf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), universe))

  sylancr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), universe), wfun(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), wcel(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), universe))
  funmpt(s0, c0, c2)

blocks.pretty:
thm mptexgf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà ùïå)

} = {

blocks.name: mptex

blocks.name: mptfvmpt
blocks.content: A function in maps-to notation as the value of another function in maps-to notation. (Contributed by AV, 20-Aug-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptfvmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cmpt(s0, c3, c4)))

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c6, c7))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)

}

thm mptfvmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {

  syl6bb(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wceq(cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)))

blocks.name: funfvima
blocks.content: A function's value in a preimage belongs to the image. (Contributed by NM, 23-Sep-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm funfvima(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2))))
} = {
  pm2.43b(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2)))
  impd(wcel(c1, c2), wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2))))
  com12(wcel(c1, c2), wfun(c0), wi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2)))))
  expd(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2))))
  syl5bir(wfun(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c2))))
  elin2(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c2)), c2, cdm(c0))
  dmres(c0, c2)
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c2))), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c2)))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c2), c1), crn(cres(c0, c2))))
  sylan(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c2))), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c2), c1), crn(cres(c0, c2))), wfun(cres(c0, c2)))
  funres(c0, c2)

  syl6rbbr(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c2), c1), crn(cres(c0, c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(cres(c0, c2))))
  eleq1d(cfv(cres(c0, c2), c1), crn(cres(c0, c2)), cfv(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2))

  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0))‚Üí(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà(c0 " c2)))

  sylan(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà dom((c0 |` c2)), ((c0 |` c2)` c1)‚àà ran((c0 |` c2)), Fun((c0 |` c2)))

blocks.name: fnfvimad

  sylc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, cin(c3, c2))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(cin(c3, c2), cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cin(c3, c2)))
  jca(w0, wfun(c0), wss(cin(c3, c2), cdm(c0)))

  inss1(c3, c2)

blocks.name: resfvresima

thm resfvresima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

blocks.name: funfvima3
blocks.content: A class including a function contains the function's value in the image of the singleton of the argument. (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm funfvima3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c0, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2)))))
} = {
  impcom(wfun(c0), wss(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2)))))
  exp32(wss(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))))
  mpbird(wa(wss(c0, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1))
  impel(wss(c0, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c0))
  ssel(c0, c1, cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))
  funfvop(c0, c2)
  ad2antll(wss(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1)))
  vtoclbg(hs0, c2, cdm(c0), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)), c1))
  eleq2d(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cima(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  imaeq2d(c1, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c2)
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)), c1, cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c0, c2))
  elimasn(cfv(c0, c2), c1, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  fvex(c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funfvima3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà dom(c0)‚Üí(c0 ` c2)‚àà(c1 " { c2 })))
} = {

  mpbird((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß(Fun(c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c0))), (c0 ` c2)‚àà(c1 " { c2 }), < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ‚àà c1)
  impel(c0 ‚äÜ c1, (Fun(c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c0)), < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ‚àà c1, < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ‚àà c0)
  ssel(c0, c1, < c2,(c0 ` c2)>)
  funfvop(c0, c2)
  ad2antll(c0 ‚äÜ c1, Fun(c0), c2 ‚àà dom(c0), ((c0 ` c2)‚àà(c1 " { c2 })‚Üî < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ‚àà c1))
  vtoclbg(hs0, c2, dom(c0), (c0 ` c2)‚àà(c1 " { c2 }), < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ‚àà c1, (c0 ` c2)‚àà(c1 " { hs0 }), < hs0,(c0 ` c2)> ‚àà c1)
  eleq2d((c0 ` c2), (c1 " { hs0 }), (c1 " { c2 }), hs0 = c2)
  imaeq2d(c1, { hs0 }, { c2 }, hs0 = c2)
  sneq(hs0, c2)
  eleq1d(< hs0,(c0 ` c2)>, c1, < c2,(c0 ` c2)>, hs0 = c2)
  opeq1(hs0, c2, (c0 ` c2))
  elimasn((c0 ` c2), c1, hs0)
  vex(hs0)

  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` c2)‚àà(c1 " { c2 }))
  diff.hs0.w(< c2,(c0 ` c2)> ‚àà c1)
}

blocks.name: fnfvima
blocks.content: The function value of an operand in a set is contained in the image of that set, using the ` Fn ` abbreviation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnfvima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cima(c0, c2)))
} = {
  sylc(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cima(c0, c2)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c2, cdm(c0))), wcel(c3, c2))
  jca(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2)), wfun(c0), wss(c2, cdm(c0)))
  3ad2ant1(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  sseqtr4d(c2, cdm(c0), c1, w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))
  simp2(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  simp3(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  funfvima2(c0, c2, c3)
}

thm fnfvima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: rexima
blocks.content: Existential quantification under an image in terms of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wrex(s0, cima(c0, c2), w0), wrex(s1, c2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  rexxfr2d(s0, s1, cima(c0, c2), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), universe, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), w0, w1)
  fvexd(c0, cv(s1), wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  fvelimab(s1, c0, c1, c2, cv(s0))
  rexbii(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  eqcom(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  adantl(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cima.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 " c2), w0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1)))
  ‚ä£ (s0 =(c0 ` s1)‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  rexxfr2d(s0, s1, (c0 " c2), c2, (c0 ` s1), universe, (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), w0, w1)
  fvexd(c0, s1, ((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))
  syl6bb((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), s0 ‚àà(c0 " c2), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c0 ` s1)= s0))
  fvelimab(s1, c0, c1, c2, s0)
  rexbii(s1, c2, (c0 ` s1)= s0, s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  eqcom((c0 ` s1), s0)
  adantl((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), s0 =(c0 ` s1), (w0 ‚Üî w1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cima.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0[Fn]c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0[Fn]c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ralima
blocks.content: Universal quantification under an image in terms of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wral(s0, cima(c0, c2), w0), wral(s1, c2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralxfr2d(s0, s1, cima(c0, c2), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), universe, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), w0, w1)
  fvexd(c0, cv(s1), wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  fvelimab(s1, c0, c1, c2, cv(s0))
  rexbii(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  eqcom(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  adantl(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cima.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm fvclss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wss(cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sseqtr4i(cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls)), cab(s0, wo(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))))
  ss2abi(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wo(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls))))
  orrd(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))
  syl6ibr(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  necon1bd(cv(s0), emptycls, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  com12(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  syl6ibr(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  eximdv(s1, wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  syl5bi(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  eqcom(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  tz6.12i(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  elrn(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  velsn(s0, emptycls)
  df-un(s0, crn(c0), csn(emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s1, cv(s0), emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elabrex

thm elabrex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6eleqr(c1, cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))), cab(s1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cab(s1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wtru)
  tru()
  rspcev(hs0, cv(s0), c0, wtru, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  2thd(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wtru)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  trud(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  elab(s1, c1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  rexbidv(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  abbii(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  cbvrex(s0, hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: abrexco
blocks.content: Composition of two image maps ` C ( y ) ` and ` B ( w ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 27-May-2013.)

thm abrexco(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), cab(s0, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c3))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  abbii(s0, wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  bitri(wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wrex(s3, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  bitr4i(wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), wex(s1, wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  bitri(wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wex(s1, wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  df-rex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  exbii(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wa(wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  elab(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  vex(s1)
  rexbidv(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  eqeq1(cv(s2), cv(s1), c1)
  r19.41v(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  rexcom4(s3, s1, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  rexbii(s3, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  ceqsexv(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wrex.s(s2, s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(s2), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)

  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c3)

}

  bitri(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà { s2 | ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c0, s2 = c1)}, s0 = c2), ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c0,(s1 = c1 ‚àß s0 = c2))), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà { s2 | ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c0, s2 = c1)} ‚àß s0 = c2)))

blocks.name: imauni
blocks.content: The image of a union is the indexed union of the images. Theorem 3K(a) of [Enderton] p. 50. (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: fniunfv
blocks.content: The indexed union of a function's values is the union of its range. Compare Definition 5.4 of [Monk1] p. 50. (Contributed by NM, 27-Sep-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm fniunfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6reqr(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cuni(crn(c0)), cuni(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  unieqd(crn(c0), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  fnrnfv(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  dfiun2(s0, hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fvex(c0, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: funiunfv
blocks.content: The indexed union of a function's values is the union of its image under the index class. Note: This theorem depends on the fact that our function value is the empty set outside of its domain. If the antecedent is changed to ` F Fn A ` , the theorem can be proved without this dependency. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: funiunfvf
blocks.content: The indexed union of a function's values is the union of its image under the index class. This version of ~ funiunfv uses a bound-variable hypothesis in place of a distinct variable condition. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2006.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 15-Apr-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm funiunfvf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(c0, c1))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5eqr(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(c0, c1)), ciun(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wfun(c0))
  cbviun(hs0, s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(hs0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  funiunfv(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

  syl(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cuni(crn(c0))), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wcel(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfun(c0))

  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((c0 ` s0)=(c0 ` s1)‚Üí s0 = s1)))), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1)))))

blocks.name: f1veqaeq
blocks.content: If the values of a one-to-one function for two arguments are equal, the arguments themselves must be equal. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1veqaeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)))
} = {
  imp(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  simplbiim(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wi(wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, c4)), wceq(c3, c4))), wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  dff13(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  com12(wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, c4, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(c3, cv(hs1))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(c3, cv(hs1)))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c3, c0, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(c3, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, c4)), wceq(c3, c4))
  eqeq2d(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c4, c0)
  eqeq2(cv(hs1), c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(c3, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)))
}

thm f1veqaeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1))‚Üí((c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` c4)‚Üí c3 = c4))
} = {
  imp((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1), ((c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` c4)‚Üí c3 = c4))
  simplbiim((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), ((c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` c4)‚Üí c3 = c4)), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))))
  dff13(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  com12(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))), (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1), ((c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` c4)‚Üí c3 = c4))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, c4, c1, ((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1), ((c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` c4)‚Üí c3 = c4), ((c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí c3 = hs1))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c3, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1, (c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` hs1), c3 = hs1)
  fveqeq2(hs0, c3, c0, (c0 ` hs1))
  eqeq1(hs0, c3, hs1)
  imbi12d(hs1 = c4, (c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` hs1), c3 = hs1, (c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` c4), c3 = c4)
  eqeq2d((c0 ` c3), (c0 ` hs1), (c0 ` c4), hs1 = c4)
  fveq2(hs1, c4, c0)
  eqeq2(hs1, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí c3 = hs1))
  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ` c3)=(c0 ` c4)‚Üí c3 = c4))
}

blocks.name: f1cofveqaeq
blocks.content: If the values of a composition of one-to-one functions for two arguments are equal, the arguments themselves must be equal. (Contributed by AV, 3-Feb-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1cofveqaeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c3, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c6, c4))), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, c5)), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, c6))), wceq(c5, c6)))
} = {
  syld(wa(wa(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c3, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c6, c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, c5)), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, c6))), wceq(c5, c6), wceq(cfv(c3, c5), cfv(c3, c6)))
  syl2an2r(wa(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c3, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c6, c4)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, c5)), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, c6))), wceq(cfv(c3, c5), cfv(c3, c6))), wf1(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, c5), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c6), c1)))
  simpl(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c3, c4, c1))
  imp(wa(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c3, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c6, c4)), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, c5), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c6), c1)))
  adantl(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c3, c4, c1), wi(wa(wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c6, c4)), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, c5), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c6), c1))))
  syl(wf1(c3, c4, c1), wi(wa(wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c6, c4)), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, c5), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c6), c1))), wf(c3, c4, c1))
  f1f(c3, c4, c1)
  anim12d(wf(c3, c4, c1), wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c6, c4), wcel(cfv(c3, c5), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c6), c1))
  ex(wf(c3, c4, c1), wcel(c5, c4), wcel(cfv(c3, c5), c1))
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, c5)
  ex(wf(c3, c4, c1), wcel(c6, c4), wcel(cfv(c3, c6), c1))
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, c6)
  f1veqaeq(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c3, c5), cfv(c3, c6))
  adantll(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c3, c4, c1), wa(wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c6, c4)), wi(wceq(cfv(c3, c5), cfv(c3, c6)), wceq(c5, c6)))
  f1veqaeq(c3, c4, c1, c5, c6)
}

thm f1cofveqaeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Ü£ c1))‚àß(c5 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c4))‚Üí((c0 `(c3 ` c5))=(c0 `(c3 ` c6))‚Üí c5 = c6))
} = {
  syld((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Ü£ c1))‚àß(c5 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c4)), (c0 `(c3 ` c5))=(c0 `(c3 ` c6)), c5 = c6, (c3 ` c5)=(c3 ` c6))
  syl2an2r(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Ü£ c1)), (c5 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c4), ((c0 `(c3 ` c5))=(c0 `(c3 ` c6))‚Üí(c3 ` c5)=(c3 ` c6)), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), ((c3 ` c5)‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` c6)‚àà c1))
  simpl((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Ü£ c1))
  imp(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Ü£ c1)), (c5 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c4), ((c3 ` c5)‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` c6)‚àà c1))
  adantl((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Ü£ c1), ((c5 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c4)‚Üí((c3 ` c5)‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` c6)‚àà c1)))
  syl((c3 : c4 ‚Ü£ c1), ((c5 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c4)‚Üí((c3 ` c5)‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` c6)‚àà c1)), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1))
  f1f(c3, c4, c1)
  anim12d((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), c5 ‚àà c4, c6 ‚àà c4, (c3 ` c5)‚àà c1, (c3 ` c6)‚àà c1)
  ex((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), c5 ‚àà c4, (c3 ` c5)‚àà c1)
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, c5)
  ex((c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), c6 ‚àà c4, (c3 ` c6)‚àà c1)
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, c6)
  f1veqaeq(c0, c1, c2, (c3 ` c5), (c3 ` c6))
  adantll((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Ü£ c1), (c5 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c4), ((c3 ` c5)=(c3 ` c6)‚Üí c5 = c6))
  f1veqaeq(c3, c4, c1, c5, c6)

thm f1imass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

} = {
  impbid1(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1)), (c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4), c3 ‚äÜ c4)
  ex(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1)), (c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4), c3 ‚äÜ c4)

  syld((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1))‚àß(c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4)), hs0 ‚àà c3, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c4), hs0 ‚àà c1)
  sseld(hs0, c3, c1, (((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1))‚àß(c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4)))
  simplrl((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), c3 ‚äÜ c1, c4 ‚äÜ c1, (c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4))
  ex((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1))‚àß(c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4)), hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c4))
  3imtr3d(((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1))‚àß(c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c3, hs0 ‚àà c4, (c0 ` hs0)‚àà(c0 " c3), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà(c0 " c4))
  sseld((c0 ` hs0), (c0 " c3), (c0 " c4), ((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1))‚àß(c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  simplr(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1)), (c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4), hs0 ‚àà c1)
  syl3anc(((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1))‚àß(c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), ((c0 ` hs0)‚àà(c0 " c3)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c3), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), hs0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚äÜ c1)
  3expa(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1)), (c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4), hs0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚äÜ c1)
  simp1rl((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), c3 ‚äÜ c1, c4 ‚äÜ c1, (c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4), hs0 ‚àà c1)
  f1elima(c0, c1, c2, hs0, c3)
  syl3anc(((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c1))‚àß(c0 " c3)‚äÜ(c0 " c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), ((c0 ` hs0)‚àà(c0 " c4)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c4), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), hs0 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚äÜ c1)

blocks.name: f1imaeq
blocks.content: Taking images under a one-to-one function preserves equality. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: f1imapss
blocks.content: Taking images under a one-to-one function preserves proper subsets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: fpropnf1
blocks.content: A function, given by an unordered pair of ordered pairs, which is not injective/one-to-one. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 8-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: f1dom3fv3dif
blocks.content: The function values for a 1-1 function from a set with three different elements are different. (Contributed by AV, 20-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1dom3fv3dif(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, w3a(wne(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wne(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c3)), wne(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c3, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wne(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wne(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wf1(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3), c7))
} = {
  3jca(w0, wne(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wne(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c3)), wne(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c3)))
  mpbird(w0, wne(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wne(c1, c2))
  simp1d(w0, wne(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wne(c2, c3))
  necon3bid(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), c1, c2, w0)
  syl12anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wf1(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3), c7), wcel(c1, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c2, ctp(c1, c2, c3)))
  f1fveq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3), c7, c1, c2)
  mpbird(w0, wne(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c3)), wne(c1, c3))
  simp2d(w0, wne(c1, c3), wne(c1, c2), wne(c2, c3))
  necon3bid(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c3), c1, c3, w0)
  syl12anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)), wf1(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3), c7), wcel(c1, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c3, ctp(c1, c2, c3)))
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c1, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), w3o(wceq(c1, c1), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  3mix1d(w0, wceq(c1, c1), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  eqidd(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), w3o(wceq(c1, c1), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c3))), wcel(c1, c4))
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c3, c6))
  eltpg(c1, c4, c1, c2, c3)
  f1fveq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3), c7, c1, c3)
  mpbird(w0, wne(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c3)), wne(c2, c3))
  simp3d(w0, wne(c2, c3), wne(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3))
  necon3bid(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c3), c2, c3, w0)
  syl12anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c3)), wceq(c2, c3)), wf1(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3), c7), wcel(c2, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c3, ctp(c1, c2, c3)))
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c2, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), w3o(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c2, c3)))
  3mix2d(w0, wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c2, c3))
  eqidd(c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c2, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), w3o(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c2, c3))), wcel(c2, c5))
  simp2d(w0, wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c6))
  eltpg(c2, c5, c1, c2, c3)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c3, c6))
  simp3d(w0, wcel(c3, c6), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5))
  tpid3g(c3, c6, c1, c2)
  f1fveq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3), c7, c2, c3)
}

thm f1dom3fv3dif(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ` c1)‚â†(c0 ` c2)‚àß(c0 ` c1)‚â†(c0 ` c3)‚àß(c0 ` c2)‚â†(c0 ` c3)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c5 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c6))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 ‚â† c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : { c1, c2, c3 } ‚Ü£ c7))
} = {
  3jca(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚â†(c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c1)‚â†(c0 ` c3), (c0 ` c2)‚â†(c0 ` c3))
  mpbird(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚â†(c0 ` c2), c1 ‚â† c2)
  simp1d(w0, c1 ‚â† c2, c1 ‚â† c3, c2 ‚â† c3)
  necon3bid((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c2), c1, c2, w0)
  syl12anc(w0, ((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)‚Üî c1 = c2), (c0 : { c1, c2, c3 } ‚Ü£ c7), c1 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 }, c2 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 })
  f1fveq(c0, { c1, c2, c3 }, c7, c1, c2)
  mpbird(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚â†(c0 ` c3), c1 ‚â† c3)
  simp2d(w0, c1 ‚â† c3, c1 ‚â† c2, c2 ‚â† c3)
  necon3bid((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c3), c1, c3, w0)
  syl12anc(w0, ((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c3)‚Üî c1 = c3), (c0 : { c1, c2, c3 } ‚Ü£ c7), c1 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 }, c3 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 })
  mpbird(w0, c1 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 }, (c1 = c1 ‚à® c1 = c2 ‚à® c1 = c3))
  3mix1d(w0, c1 = c1, c1 = c2, c1 = c3)
  eqidd(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 } ‚Üî(c1 = c1 ‚à® c1 = c2 ‚à® c1 = c3)), c1 ‚àà c4)
  simp1d(w0, c1 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c5, c3 ‚àà c6)
  eltpg(c1, c4, c1, c2, c3)
  f1fveq(c0, { c1, c2, c3 }, c7, c1, c3)
  mpbird(w0, (c0 ` c2)‚â†(c0 ` c3), c2 ‚â† c3)
  simp3d(w0, c2 ‚â† c3, c1 ‚â† c2, c1 ‚â† c3)
  necon3bid((c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c3), c2, c3, w0)
  syl12anc(w0, ((c0 ` c2)=(c0 ` c3)‚Üî c2 = c3), (c0 : { c1, c2, c3 } ‚Ü£ c7), c2 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 }, c3 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 })
  mpbird(w0, c2 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 }, (c2 = c1 ‚à® c2 = c2 ‚à® c2 = c3))
  3mix2d(w0, c2 = c1, c2 = c2, c2 = c3)
  eqidd(c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 } ‚Üî(c2 = c1 ‚à® c2 = c2 ‚à® c2 = c3)), c2 ‚àà c5)
  simp2d(w0, c2 ‚àà c5, c1 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c6)
  eltpg(c2, c5, c1, c2, c3)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà { c1, c2, c3 }, c3 ‚àà c6)
  simp3d(w0, c3 ‚àà c6, c1 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c5)
  tpid3g(c3, c6, c1, c2)
  f1fveq(c0, { c1, c2, c3 }, c7, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: f1dom3el3dif
blocks.content: The range of a 1-1 function from a set with three different elements has (at least) three different elements. (Contributed by AV, 20-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1dom3el3dif(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wne(c1, c3), wne(c1, c5), wne(c3, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wf1(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s1, c5))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), w3a(wcel(cfv(c7, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c3), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c5), c0)), w3a(wne(cfv(c7, c1), cfv(c7, c3)), wne(cfv(c7, c1), cfv(c7, c5)), wne(cfv(c7, c3), cfv(c7, c5))))
  mpcom(w0, w3a(wcel(cfv(c7, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c3), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c5), c0)), wf1(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0))
  syl(wf1(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0), wi(w0, w3a(wcel(cfv(c7, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c3), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c5), c0))), wf(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0))
  f1f(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0)
  expcom(wf(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0), w0, w3a(wcel(cfv(c7, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c3), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c5), c0)))
  3jca(wa(w0, wf(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0)), wcel(cfv(c7, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c3), c0), wcel(cfv(c7, c5), c0))
  ffvelrnd(c7, c1, c0, ctp(c1, c3, c5), wa(w0, wf(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wf(c7, ctp(c1, c3, c5), c0), wcel(c1, ctp(c1, c3, c5)))
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c1, ctp(c1, c3, c5)), w3o(wceq(c1, c1), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(c1, c5)))
  3mix1d(w0, wceq(c1, c1), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(c1, c5))
  eqidd(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, ctp(c1, c3, c5)), w3o(wceq(c1, c1), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(c1, c5))), wcel(c1, c2))

  adantl(c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0, (Fun(`' c0)‚Üî Fun(c0)))
  funeq(`' c0, c0)

  sylanbrc((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß `' c0 = c0), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c1), c0[Fn]c1, ran(c0)= c1)
  simpl(c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0)
  sylan9eqr(ran(c0), c1, dom(c0), c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0)
  syl5eq(ran(c0), dom(c0), dom(`' c0), `' c0 = c0)

blocks.name: nvocnv
blocks.content: The converse of an involution is the function itself. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-May-2019.)

thm nvocnv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))

} = {
  3eqtr4d(ccnv(c0), c0, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))))
  mptcnv(hs0, hs1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))))
  impbida(wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))

  eqeltrd(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))

  fveq2d(c0, cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  simprr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  rspcdva(s0, cv(hs0), c1, wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0), cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

blocks.content: Relate a function with a singleton as domain and one variable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Jul-2020.)

thm fsnex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), w0)), wrex(s1, c2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), w0)), wrex(s1, c2, w1))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), w0)), wrex(s1, c2, w1))
  exlimdv(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), w0), wrex(s1, c2, w1))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), w0), wrex(s1, c2, w1))
  rspcedvd(s1, c2, cfv(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), w0)), w1, w0)
  adantrr(wcel(c0, c1), wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), w0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c0), c2))
  simprbda(wcel(c0, c1), wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cop(c0, cfv(cv(s0), c0)))))
  fsn2g(c0, c1, cv(s0), c2)

  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s1, c2, w1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), csn(c0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), c0)))), wf(csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))), csn(c0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))), c0)))

  eqcomd(cv(s1), cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))), c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  elvd(s1, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))), c0), cv(s1)))
  fvsng(c0, c1, cv(s1), universe)

thm fsnex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1)))
  ‚ä£ (s1 =(s0 ` c0)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  impbida(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))
  imp(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))
  exlimdv(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))
  ex(c0 ‚àà c1, ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))
  rspcedvd(s1, c2, (s0 ` c0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0)), w1, w0)
  adantrr(c0 ‚àà c1, (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), w0, (s0 ` c0)‚àà c2)
  simprbda(c0 ‚àà c1, (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), (s0 ` c0)‚àà c2, s0 = { < c0,(s0 ` c0)> })
  fsn2g(c0, c1, s0, c2)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0)), s1 =(s0 ` c0), (w1 ‚Üî w0))
  simprr(c0 ‚àà c1, (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), w0)
  r19.29af(s1, c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1)), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0)), w1)
  nfan(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))
  nfv(s1, c0 ‚àà c1)
  nfre1(s1, c2, w1)
  mpd((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0)), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0))))
  syl2anc((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0))), ({ < c0, s1 > } : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), s1 =({ < c0, s1 > } ` c0))
  fssd({ < c0, s1 > }, { c0 }, c2, { s1 }, (((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1))
  syl((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1), ({ < c0, s1 > } : { c0 } ‚Üí { s1 }), ({ < c0, s1 > } : { c0 } ‚Üî { s1 }))
  ad3antrrr(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1), s1 ‚àà c2, w1, ({ < c0, s1 > } : { c0 } ‚Üî { s1 }))
  elvd(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, ({ < c0, s1 > } : { c0 } ‚Üî { s1 }))
  f1osng(c0, c1, s1, universe)
  f1of({ < c0, s1 > }, { c0 }, { s1 })
  snssd(s1, c2, (((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1))
  simplr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1)), s1 ‚àà c2, w1)
  ad3antrrr(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1), s1 ‚àà c2, w1, s1 =({ < c0, s1 > } ` c0))
  eqcomd(s1, ({ < c0, s1 > } ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  elvd(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, ({ < c0, s1 > } ` c0)= s1)
  fvsng(c0, c1, s1, universe)
  spcev(s0, { < c0, s1 > }, (({ < c0, s1 > } : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =({ < c0, s1 > } ` c0)), ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0)))
  snex(< c0, s1 >)
  anbi12d(s0 = { < c0, s1 > }, (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), s1 =(s0 ` c0), ({ < c0, s1 > } : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), s1 =({ < c0, s1 > } ` c0))
  feq1(s0, { < c0, s1 > }, { c0 }, c2)
  eqeq2d(s1, (s0 ` c0), ({ < c0, s1 > } ` c0), s0 = { < c0, s1 > })
  fveq1(s0, { < c0, s1 > }, c0)
  eximdv(s0, (((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1), ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0)), ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0))
  ex((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1), ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0)), ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0))
  jca(((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1)‚àß((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0))), (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), w0)
  mpdan(((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1)‚àß((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0))), w0, (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2))
  simprl((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1), (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), s1 =(s0 ` c0))
  mpbid((((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1)‚àß((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0)))‚àß(s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)), w0, w1)
  simpllr(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), w1, ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0)), (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2))
  syl((((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1)‚àß((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß s1 =(s0 ` c0)))‚àß(s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)), (w1 ‚Üî w0), s1 =(s0 ` c0))
  simplrr((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚àß w1), (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), s1 =(s0 ` c0), (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, w1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0))
  diff.wex.s(s1, s0, ((s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2)‚àß w0))
  diff.wa.s(s1, (s0 : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), w0)
  diff.wf.s(s1, s0, { c0 }, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.csn.s(s1, c0)

  diff.wa.s(s0, ({ < c0, s1 > } : { c0 } ‚Üí c2), s1 =({ < c0, s1 > } ` c0))
  diff.wf.s(s0, { < c0, s1 > }, { c0 }, c2)

blocks.name: f1prex
blocks.content: Relate a one-to-one function with a pair as domain and two different variables. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1prex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wex(s0, wa(wf1(cv(s0), cpr(c0, c2), c4), w0)), wrex(s1, c4, wrex(s2, c4, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w1)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), c2)), wb(w2, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wf1(cv(s0), cpr(c0, c2), c4), w0)), wrex(s1, c4, wrex(s2, c4, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w1))))
  exlimdv(s0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wa(wf1(cv(s0), cpr(c0, c2), c4), w0), wrex(s1, c4, wrex(s2, c4, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w1))))

blocks.name: f1ocnvdm
blocks.content: The value of the converse of a one-to-one onto function belongs to its domain. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-2006.)

blocks.name: f1ocnvfvrneq
blocks.content: If the values of a one-to-one function for two arguments from the range of the function are equal, the arguments themselves must be equal. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: fcof1
blocks.content: An application is injective if a retraction exists. Proposition 8 of [BourbakiEns] p. E.II.18. (Contributed by FL, 11-Nov-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)

blocks.content: An application is surjective if a section exists. Proposition 8 of [BourbakiEns] p. E.II.18. (Contributed by FL, 17-Nov-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)

thm fcofo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2))), wfo(c0, c1, c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2))), wfo(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))

  3ad2antl2(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c1))
  ffvelrn(c3, c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  3eqtr3rd(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(cid, c2), cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  fveq1d(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs0), cres(cid, c2), wa(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpl3(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  3ad2antl2(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))))
  fvco3(c3, c2, c1, cv(hs0), c0)
  adantl(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  fvresi(cv(hs0), c2)

  fveq2(cv(hs1), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c0)

  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2))))

thm fcofo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2))‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2)), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1))))
  simp1((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1), (c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2))

  syl2anc((((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)), (c3 ` hs0)‚àà c1, hs0 =(c0 `(c3 ` hs0)))
  3ad2antl2((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1), (c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2), hs0 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` hs0)‚àà c1)
  ffvelrn(c3, c2, c1, hs0)
  3eqtr3rd(hs0, (c0 `(c3 ` hs0)), ((c0 ‚àò c3)` hs0), ((= |` c2)` hs0), (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  fveq1d((c0 ‚àò c3), hs0, (= |` c2), (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  simpl3((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1), (c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  3ad2antl2((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1), (c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2), hs0 ‚àà c2, ((c0 ‚àò c3)` hs0)=(c0 `(c3 ` hs0)))
  fvco3(c3, c2, c1, hs0, c0)
  adantl(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2)), hs0 ‚àà c2, ((= |` c2)` hs0)= hs0)
  fvresi(hs0, c2)
  rspceeqv(hs1, (c3 ` hs0), c1, hs0, (c0 `(c3 ` hs0)), (c0 ` hs1))
  fveq2(hs1, (c3 ` hs0), c0)
  dffo3(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2)))
  diff.hs1.c((c3 ` hs0))

blocks.name: cbvfo
blocks.content: Change bound variable between domain and range of function. (Contributed by NM, 23-Feb-1997.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvfo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wb(wral(s0, c1, w0), wral(s1, c2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitr3d(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c1, w0), wral(s1, c2, w1), wral(s1, crn(c0), w1))
  syl(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wb(wral(s1, crn(c0), w1), wral(s0, c1, w0)), wfn(c0, c1))
  fofn(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrn(s1, s0, c0, c1, w1, w0)
  eqcoms(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wb(w1, w0))
  bicomd(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), w1, w0)
  raleqdv(s1, crn(c0), c2, wfo(c0, c1, c2), w1)
  forn(c0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
}

  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, cv(hs0))

  ffvelrn(c5, c4, c1, cv(hs0))

thm cocan1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1))‚Üí((c0 ‚àò c3)=(c0 ‚àò c5)‚Üî c3 = c5))

  ralbidva(hs0, c4, ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), ((c0 ‚àò c3)` hs0)=((c0 ‚àò c5)` hs0), (c3 ` hs0)=(c5 ` hs0))
  bitrd((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), ((c0 ‚àò c3)` hs0)=((c0 ‚àò c5)` hs0), (c3 ` hs0)=(c5 ` hs0), (c0 `(c3 ` hs0))=(c0 `(c5 ` hs0)))
  eqeq12d(((c0 ‚àò c3)` hs0), ((c0 ‚àò c5)` hs0), (c0 `(c3 ` hs0)), (c0 `(c5 ` hs0)), (((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4))
  3ad2antl2((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, ((c0 ‚àò c3)` hs0)=(c0 `(c3 ` hs0)))
  fvco3(c3, c4, c1, hs0, c0)
  3ad2antl3((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, ((c0 ‚àò c5)` hs0)=(c0 `(c5 ` hs0)))
  fvco3(c5, c4, c1, hs0, c0)
  syl12anc((((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), ((c0 `(c3 ` hs0))=(c0 `(c5 ` hs0))‚Üî(c3 ` hs0)=(c5 ` hs0)), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 ` hs0)‚àà c1, (c5 ` hs0)‚àà c1)
  simpl1((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1), hs0 ‚àà c4)
  3ad2antl2((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c3 ` hs0)‚àà c1)
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, hs0)
  3ad2antl3((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c5 ` hs0)‚àà c1)
  ffvelrn(c5, c4, c1, hs0)
  f1fveq(c0, c1, c2, (c3 ` hs0), (c5 ` hs0))
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), ((c0 ‚àò c3)=(c0 ‚àò c5)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,((c0 ‚àò c3)` hs0)=((c0 ‚àò c5)` hs0))), (c0 ‚àò c3)[Fn]c4, (c0 ‚àò c5)[Fn]c4)
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), (c0 ‚àò c3)[Fn]c4, c0[Fn]c1, (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1))
  fnfco(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), (c0 ‚àò c5)[Fn]c4, c0[Fn]c1, (c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1))
  ffnd(c0, c1, c2, ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1)))
  3ad2ant1((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  f1f(c0, c1, c2)
  fnfco(c0, c1, c5, c4)
  eqfnfv(hs0, (c0 ‚àò c3), c4, (c0 ‚àò c5))
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), (c3 = c5 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c3 ` hs0)=(c5 ` hs0))), c3[Fn]c4, c5[Fn]c4)
  ffnd(c3, c4, c1, ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)‚àß(c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1)))
  simp2((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), (c5 : c4 ‚Üí c1))

  diff.hs0.c((c0 ‚àò c3))

blocks.name: cocan2
blocks.content: A surjection is right-cancelable. (Contributed by FL, 21-Nov-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cocan2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wb(wceq(ccom(c3, c0), ccom(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wceq(ccom(c3, c0), ccom(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccom(c4, c0), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))))
  bitrd(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccom(c4, c0), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  ralbidva(hs0, c1, w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccom(c4, c0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccom(c4, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wa(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sylan(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  fvco3(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3)
  sylan(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  fvco3(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c4)
  3ad2ant1(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2), wb(wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))))
  cbvfo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), c3)
  fveq2(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), c4)
  syl2anc(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wb(wceq(ccom(c3, c0), ccom(c4, c0)), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccom(c4, c0), cv(hs0))))), wfn(ccom(c3, c0), c1), wfn(ccom(c4, c0), c1))
  syl2anc(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wfn(ccom(c3, c0), c1), wfn(c3, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  fnfco(c3, c2, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wfn(ccom(c4, c0), c1), wfn(c4, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  fof(c0, c1, c2)
  fnfco(c4, c2, c0, c1)
  eqfnfv(hs0, ccom(c3, c0), c1, ccom(c4, c0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)), wb(wceq(c3, c4), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2))
  simp2(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2))
  simp3(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2))
  eqfnfv(hs1, c3, c2, c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c3, c2), wfn(c4, c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c3, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c4, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cocan2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2)‚Üí((c3 ‚àò c0)=(c4 ‚àò c0)‚Üî c3 = c4))
} = {
  3bitr4d(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), (c3 ‚àò c0)=(c4 ‚àò c0), c3 = c4, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,((c3 ‚àò c0)` hs0)=((c4 ‚àò c0)` hs0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c3 ` hs1)=(c4 ` hs1)))
  bitrd(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,((c3 ‚àò c0)` hs0)=((c4 ‚àò c0)` hs0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c3 ` hs1)=(c4 ` hs1)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(c3 `(c0 ` hs0))=(c4 `(c0 ` hs0))))
  ralbidva(hs0, c1, ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), ((c3 ‚àò c0)` hs0)=((c4 ‚àò c0)` hs0), (c3 `(c0 ` hs0))=(c4 `(c0 ` hs0)))
  eqeq12d(((c3 ‚àò c0)` hs0), ((c4 ‚àò c0)` hs0), (c3 `(c0 ` hs0)), (c4 `(c0 ` hs0)), (((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  sylan(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), hs0 ‚àà c1, ((c3 ‚àò c0)` hs0)=(c3 `(c0 ` hs0)), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  fvco3(c0, c1, c2, hs0, c3)
  sylan(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), hs0 ‚àà c1, ((c4 ‚àò c0)` hs0)=(c4 `(c0 ` hs0)), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  fvco3(c0, c1, c2, hs0, c4)
  3ad2ant1((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), c3[Fn]c2, c4[Fn]c2, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(c3 `(c0 ` hs0))=(c4 `(c0 ` hs0)))‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c3 ` hs1)=(c4 ` hs1))))
  cbvfo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, (c3 `(c0 ` hs0))=(c4 `(c0 ` hs0)), (c3 ` hs1)=(c4 ` hs1))
  eqeq12d((c3 `(c0 ` hs0)), (c4 `(c0 ` hs0)), (c3 ` hs1), (c4 ` hs1), (c0 ` hs0)= hs1)
  fveq2((c0 ` hs0), hs1, c3)
  fveq2((c0 ` hs0), hs1, c4)
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), ((c3 ‚àò c0)=(c4 ‚àò c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,((c3 ‚àò c0)` hs0)=((c4 ‚àò c0)` hs0))), (c3 ‚àò c0)[Fn]c1, (c4 ‚àò c0)[Fn]c1)
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), (c3 ‚àò c0)[Fn]c1, c3[Fn]c2, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  fnfco(c3, c2, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), (c4 ‚àò c0)[Fn]c1, c4[Fn]c2, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  3ad2ant1((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), c3[Fn]c2, c4[Fn]c2, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  fof(c0, c1, c2)
  fnfco(c4, c2, c0, c1)
  eqfnfv(hs0, (c3 ‚àò c0), c1, (c4 ‚àò c0))
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2), (c3 = c4 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c3 ` hs1)=(c4 ` hs1))), c3[Fn]c2, c4[Fn]c2)
  simp2((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), c3[Fn]c2, c4[Fn]c2)
  simp3((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), c3[Fn]c2, c4[Fn]c2)
  eqfnfv(hs1, c3, c2, c4)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚àß c3[Fn]c2 ‚àß c4[Fn]c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c3 ` hs1)=(c4 ` hs1))
  diff.hs1.w((c3 `(c0 ` hs0))=(c4 `(c0 ` hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c((c3 ‚àò c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c4 ‚àò c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: fcof1oinvd
blocks.content: Show that a function is the inverse of a bijective function if their composition is the identity function. Formerly part of proof of ~ fcof1o . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcof1oinvd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccnv(c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c0, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cres(cid, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr3rd(ccnv(c0), c1, ccom(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c1)), ccom(ccnv(c0), cres(cid, c3)), w0)
  coeq2d(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c1), cres(cid, c3), w0)
  syl5eqr(ccom(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c1)), c1, ccom(ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), c1), w0)
  coass(ccnv(c0), c0, c1)
  eqtrd(ccom(ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), c1), c1, ccom(cres(cid, c2), c1), w0)
  coeq1d(ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), c1, cres(cid, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), cres(cid, c2)), wf1o(c0, c2, c3))
  f1ococnv1(c0, c2, c3)
  syl(w0, wceq(ccom(cres(cid, c2), c1), c1), wf(c1, c3, c2))
  fcoi2(c1, c3, c2)
  syl(w0, wceq(ccom(ccnv(c0), cres(cid, c3)), ccnv(c0)), wf(ccnv(c0), c3, c2))
  syl(w0, wf(ccnv(c0), c3, c2), wf1o(ccnv(c0), c3, c2))
  syl(w0, wf1o(ccnv(c0), c3, c2), wf1o(c0, c2, c3))
  f1ocnv(c0, c2, c3)
  f1of(ccnv(c0), c3, c2)
  fcoi1(ccnv(c0), c3, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fcof1oinvd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí `' c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c2 ‚Üî c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c3 ‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)=(= |` c3))
} = {
  3eqtr3rd(`' c0, c1, (`' c0 ‚àò(c0 ‚àò c1)), (`' c0 ‚àò(= |` c3)), w0)
  coeq2d(`' c0, (c0 ‚àò c1), (= |` c3), w0)
  syl5eqr((`' c0 ‚àò(c0 ‚àò c1)), c1, ((`' c0 ‚àò c0)‚àò c1), w0)
  coass(`' c0, c0, c1)
  eqtrd(((`' c0 ‚àò c0)‚àò c1), c1, ((= |` c2)‚àò c1), w0)
  coeq1d((`' c0 ‚àò c0), c1, (= |` c2), w0)
  syl(w0, (`' c0 ‚àò c0)=(= |` c2), (c0 : c2 ‚Üî c3))
  f1ococnv1(c0, c2, c3)
  syl(w0, ((= |` c2)‚àò c1)= c1, (c1 : c3 ‚Üí c2))
  fcoi2(c1, c3, c2)
  syl(w0, (`' c0 ‚àò(= |` c3))= `' c0, (`' c0 : c3 ‚Üí c2))
  syl(w0, (`' c0 : c3 ‚Üí c2), (`' c0 : c3 ‚Üî c2))
  syl(w0, (`' c0 : c3 ‚Üî c2), (c0 : c2 ‚Üî c3))
  f1ocnv(c0, c2, c3)
  f1of(`' c0, c3, c2)
  fcoi1(`' c0, c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: fcof1od
blocks.content: A function is bijective if a "retraction" and a "section" exist, see comments for ~ fcof1 and ~ fcofo . Formerly part of proof of ~ fcof1o . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcof1od(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c3, c0), cres(cid, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2)))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(ccom(c3, c0), cres(cid, c1)))
  fcof1(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wfo(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c2, c1), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cres(cid, c2)))
  fcofo(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  df-f1o(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fcof1od(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üî c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3 ‚àò c0)=(= |` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c2), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Ü£ c2), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 ‚àò c0)=(= |` c1))
  fcof1(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1), (c0 ‚àò c3)=(= |` c2))
  fcofo(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  df-f1o(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: 2fcoidinvd
blocks.content: Show that a function is the inverse of a function if their compositions are the identity functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: fcof1o
blocks.content: Show that two functions are inverse to each other by computing their compositions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: 2fvcoidd
blocks.content: Show that the composition of two functions is the identity function by applying both functions to each value of the domain of the first function. (Contributed by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2fvcoidd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cres(cid, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(ccom(c0, c1), cres(cid, c2), cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), wf(c0, c3, c2), wf(c1, c2, c3))
  fcompt(hs0, c0, c3, c2, c1, c2)
  syl6eq(cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), cres(cid, c2), cmpt(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c2, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), w0)
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0))), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cv(s0))))
  rspccv(s0, c2, cv(hs0), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cv(s0), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  2fveq3(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  mptresid(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2fvcoidd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)=(= |` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c2 ‚Üí c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c3 ‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 `(c1 ` s0))= s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0 ‚àò c1), (= |` c2), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c0 `(c1 ` hs0))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àò c1)=(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c0 `(c1 ` hs0))), (c0 : c3 ‚Üí c2), (c1 : c2 ‚Üí c3))
  fcompt(hs0, c0, c3, c2, c1, c2)
  syl6eq((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c0 `(c1 ` hs0))), (= |` c2), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs0), w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c2, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), hs0, w0)
  imp(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0))= hs0)
  syl(w0, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(c0 `(c1 ` hs0))= hs0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 `(c1 ` s0))= s0))
  rspccv(s0, c2, hs0, (c0 `(c1 ` s0))= s0, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0))= hs0)
  eqeq12d((c0 `(c1 ` s0)), s0, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), hs0, s0 = hs0)
  2fveq3(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  id(s0 = hs0)
  mptresid(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, (c1 ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: 2fvidf1od
blocks.content: A function is bijective if it has an inverse function. (Contributed by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2fvidf1od(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cv(s1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  fcof1od(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  2fvcoidd(s0, c3, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  2fvcoidd(s1, c0, c3, c2, c1, w0)
}

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3 : c2 ‚Üí c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 `(c0 ` s0))= s0))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {

  2fvcoidd(s1, c0, c3, c2, c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: 2fvidinvd
blocks.content: Show that two functions are inverse to each other by applying them twice to each value of their domains. (Contributed by AV, 13-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2fvidinvd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccnv(c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cv(s1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  2fcoidinvd(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  2fvcoidd(s0, c1, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  2fvcoidd(s1, c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
}

thm 2fvidinvd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)

blocks.name: f1eqcocnv
blocks.content: Condition for function equality in terms of vanishing of the composition with the inverse. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Feb-2015.)

  syl2an2r(wa(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wf1(c3, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))

thm fliftrel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

thm fliftcnv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  mpancom(w0, wceq(ccnv(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, cop(c2, c3)))), wa(wrel(ccnv(c0)), wrel(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, cop(c2, c3))))))

  relcnv(c0)
